story:
We may have missed our mark on the crowdfunding campaign, but beautiful biology will continue on. Visit us at www.revolutionbio.co to see the latest updates!  

It's a gardener's dream - a unique, beautiful, and personal plant


In June last year, did you suddenly realize that your border really needs more red in it? Now you don't need to re-plant, you can just change the color of your flowers! 

This petunia has creamy white blossoms, but when you water it with our special solution flowers turn from white to vibrant red in 24 hours - and then stays red for the life of the flower.  To return to white, just water with regular H20. All of the new flowers will be white. 

Color changing flowers are just the first step in personalized plants. We hope you'll join us in planting a whole new garden. 


Why do you need a color changing flower? 

  • You love plants!  Your garden is full of rare and unique plants and you're looking for a beautiful addition no one else will have. 
  • You are an educator! and you want a cool, hands on way to share science with your students.   
  • You are an artist! You love the intersection between science and art, and this flower represents the challenges and opportunities there. 
  • You think biotechnology is the coolest thing out there! You want to share that with your friends & family with a piece of beautiful biotech everyone can enjoy. 

Why color changing flowers? 

  • They're pretty darn cool!
  • Everyone loves petunias - we buy about 11 million of them in the US every year
  • There are decades of incredible research behind our flowers & we're working with experts to develop these flowers. 
  • They're the beginning of a whole new way of thinking about biology. We can work with it, not against it, to build a beautiful sustainable future.

Making flowers change color was artificial, slow, and out of your control. 


For cut flowers, you needed dyes or chemicals, neither of which color the flower fully and completely.  Florists sometimes remedy this with spray paint to get the brilliant hues you see in your average daisy bouquet.   Who wants to smell spray paint? 

The color changing flowers you grow in your garden, hydrangeas for example, change color slowly, and according to a complex network of environmental cues that you might not be able to control. We've taken the guessing out of it with the color-changing petunia - just share a beer with the plant and watch it change color in hours! 


How does it work?

Add ethanol to the soil just once (the other half of the beer you use to catch slugs maybe), and flowers turn a vibrant red.  That's it!


Here's what people are saying: 

"So beautiful, and my kids will think they're magic flowers!"  - Laurie, N.

Your flowers connect science with people through beauty! - Alicia L.

"Excellent. Flowers are beautiful, especially if they change color" - Tom R.  

"Truly beautiful science!" - Heather U.


What do you get?


 

We're Revolution Bio


We are Keira Havens and Nikolai Braun, plant molecular biologists passionate about biotechnology.   One day we decided the time was right to take a daring step outside the comforts of the laboratory and make something beautiful and functional. Learn more at our FAQ!


Risks & Challenges

Science is one big experiment - sometimes it doesn't work.  One risk here is that we'll run into unexpected obstacles and the project will take longer than advertised.

We've done our best to minimize this risk - we're working with a great team, on an appropriate timeline, with a reasonable goal.  We are experienced professionals, and prior to this have years of success making plants that change color.  We have a rock star team assembled to deliver this project, plus, we already  have a functional color-changing flower now. 

We are devoted to using safe biotechnology practices, and preventing the unintended spread of these strains. We will not release a plant unless we know that it is safe-- for people and for the environment. A big part of this, for us, is doing it right. And engaging the public in a conversation about the real risks and rewards or this set of technologies.

Right now, we are able to follow a streamlined regulatory pathway that will allow us to ship these flowers in the USA.  Regulations in other countries are more difficult to navigate, and it may be that regulatory concerns will prevent us from either exhibiting the art installation or distributing these flowers to households outside the USA.  Even though the project is a year and a half from completion, we have already started working with regulatory teams in the USA and the UK.  Global friends, if you'd like to support this project, we encourage you to buy some of the fantastic art available.  

For more on environmental risk assessment, please see our FAQ.

We're excited about building a more beautiful future with you.
story_txt:
We may have missed our mark on the crowdfunding campaign, but beautiful biology will continue on. Visit us at www.revolutionbio.co to see the latest updates!  It's a gardener's dream - a unique, beautiful, and personal plantIn June last year, did you suddenly realize that your border really needs more red in it? Now you don't need to re-plant, you can just change the color of your flowers! This petunia has creamy white blossoms, but when you water it with our special solution flowers turn from white to vibrant red in 24 hours - and then stays red for the life of the flower.  To return to white, just water with regular H20. All of the new flowers will be white. 
Color changing flowers are just the first step in personalized plants. We hope you'll join us in planting a whole new garden. 

Why do you need a color changing flower? 


You love plants!  Your garden is full of rare and unique plants and you're looking for a beautiful addition no one else will have. 


You are an educator! and you want a cool, hands on way to share science with your students.   

You are an artist! You love the intersection between science and art, and this flower represents the challenges and opportunities there. 

You think biotechnology is the coolest thing out there! You want to share that with your friends & family with a piece of beautiful biotech everyone can enjoy. 


Why color changing flowers? 


They're pretty darn cool!
Everyone loves petunias - we buy about 11 million of them in the US every year
There are decades of incredible research behind our flowers & we're working with experts to develop these flowers. 
They're the beginning of a whole new way of thinking about biology. We can work with it, not against it, to build a beautiful sustainable future.




Making flowers change color was artificial, slow, and out of your control. 


For cut flowers, you needed dyes or chemicals, neither of which color the flower fully and completely.  Florists sometimes remedy this with spray paint to get the brilliant hues you see in your average daisy bouquet.   Who wants to smell spray paint? 


The color changing flowers you grow in your garden, hydrangeas for example, change color slowly, and according to a complex network of environmental cues that you might not be able to control. We've taken the guessing out of it with the color-changing petunia - just share a beer with the plant and watch it change color in hours! 





How does it work?
Add ethanol to the soil just once (the other half of the beer you use to catch slugs maybe), and flowers turn a vibrant red.  That's it!

Here's what people are saying: 
"So beautiful, and my kids will think they're magic flowers!"  - Laurie, N.
Your flowers connect science with people through beauty! - Alicia L.
"Excellent. Flowers are beautiful, especially if they change color" - Tom R.  
"Truly beautiful science!" - Heather U.

What do you get?




 

We're Revolution Bio








We are Keira Havens and Nikolai Braun, plant molecular biologists passionate about biotechnology.   One day we decided the time was right to take a daring step outside the comforts of the laboratory and make something beautiful and functional. Learn more at our FAQ!

Risks & Challenges

Science is one big experiment - sometimes it doesn't work.  One risk here is that we'll run into unexpected obstacles and the project will take longer than advertised.
We've done our best to minimize this risk - we're working with a great team, on an appropriate timeline, with a reasonable goal.  We are experienced professionals, and prior to this have years of success making plants that change color.  We have a rock star team assembled to deliver this project, plus, we already  have a functional color-changing flower now. 
We are devoted to using safe biotechnology practices, and preventing the unintended spread of these strains. We will not release a plant unless we know that it is safe-- for people and for the environment. A big part of this, for us, is doing it right. And engaging the public in a conversation about the real risks and rewards or this set of technologies.
Right now, we are able to follow a streamlined regulatory pathway that will allow us to ship these flowers in the USA.  Regulations in other countries are more difficult to navigate, and it may be that regulatory concerns will prevent us from either exhibiting the art installation or distributing these flowers to households outside the USA.  Even though the project is a year and a half from completion, we have already started working with regulatory teams in the USA and the UK.  Global friends, if you'd like to support this project, we encourage you to buy some of the fantastic art available.  
For more on environmental risk assessment, please see our FAQ.
We're excited about building a more beautiful future with you.

story:
“... if there is something in the world you are dreaming of doing, just have a look at those who are already doing that. When you see that they are just ordinary people, you’ll realize you may do that thing too and succeed.” - Federico Fellini

Who are we?

Welcome, dear friends! You have paid attention to our project and it is already a success for us! However, the information below will also be of great interest to you, and you may also be feeling anxious about the implementation of this project, just the way I am.

Life is an art. Creating your own life, enjoying it and giving joy to other people is the way of a real human being.

No matter what form the art may take, its ultimate goal has always been the same - the development of the spiritual sphere of mankind through emotional content, the satisfaction of its desire for beauty.

But has anyone ever thought of how many obstacles there are between an author and humanity? How hard is it for a person who is really talented to show their works? Sometimes, it takes an artist longer than a lifetime to do that...

Did you know that Vincent Van Gogh died in 1890 and he had sold during his life only one painting for $109 (converted to the current purchasing power of the dollar)? He became popular only in 1920, i.e. 20 years after his death...

Paul Gauguin, Amedeo Modigliani, Franz Kafka, Emily Dickinson... This list can be continued. I think that the people who were deprived of the possibility to be represented timely and were recognized by society too late have slowed down the development of mankind.

It should have be written here that we are a small group of enthusiasts who admire art and would like to promote it. However, when I started working on this project, the people participating in it refused to do so, fearing the impossibility to compete with the existing portals. Nevertheless, I know for sure that competition has never harmed anyone, and therefore I am willing to see it through to the end and I am confident that with your help, this goal will be achieved.

I became interested in the arts about three years ago, when I tried my own hand at painting. To be honest, I failed completely, but I felt a great desire to help those people who are really good at art. Moreover, when I found out how many obstacles a young artist has in their way to recognition, this desire to help only grew stronger and stronger every day.

My major occupation is finance and law. I have worked for over 9 years in the field of business auditing, and therefore the control over business processes is something I have considerable experience in. At the moment, I am voluntarily assisted by my friends who I also consider to be professionals in their fields: managers, linguists, graphic designers and other people who would like to make this world a better place.

We believe that the popularization of art will be the driving force for this world.

 

What is Leox.red?

Have you ever created anything by yourself? And if so, what brought you joy: the fact of creating something new or the happiness of realizing that your work would be estimated at its true worth by others? I think the answer is: both.

And have you ever bought a really unique thing? What did you feel when you realized it was one of a kind? It is a great feeling and you know it.

Our goal is to create the largest trading platform in the world for the sale of hand-made art. This is what Leox is about.

We are not talking about famous artists only, who are already known and honored in their own countries and worldwide, but rather all the people involved in arts. Furthermore, we are talking about beginning artists, sculptors and craftsmen. We are sure that any work of art created with feeling will find its owner, even if there are thousands of kilometers between them.

And it does not matter what it is - an oil painting or a bracelet made of stones from the island coast where you dream to travel to.

Leox.red is a business run in compliance with the existing models which have been substantially transformed in order to achieve better results taking into account the demands and desires of the new open-minded generation in which we belong.

It may seem that globalization has affected all the spheres of our life, but if you look closer, you will see that it has had absolutely no effect on craft in general and works of art in particular. You can buy any factory-made (mass produced) thing in any corner of the world any time, and, at the same time, it is extremely difficult to do so with respect to unique products.

Leox.red is intended to change this situation and give the world this opportunity.

The concept of the portal

Leox.red is a trading platform where, in order to post their lot, an artist should pay either a fixed fee or a certain percentage of each sale (i.e. a flexible pricing policy for users). By lot we mean one item from an artist which may have a few photos. An artist is unlimited in the number of items posted, but the number of photos uploaded to the items is limited.

Having analyzed the market of similar trading platforms, having studied in detail the strengths and weaknesses of each player and having justly estimated what new and better Leox.red can give to each of the parties interested in the process of trading works of art, we can say with certainty that we do have something to offer to creative people to realize their fullest potential!

Please read more details below.

 

Do people really need this?

“By three methods we may learn wisdom: first, by reflection, which is noblest; second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.” - Confucius

 

In today’s world, we will have to use all the three methods, and the first one is reflection.

The major players existing in the world today in this sector are etsy.com,  artmajeur.com, saatchiart.com, artenet.es and milanuncios.com. They cover mainly English-speaking and Spanish-speaking users, and have some drawbacks, which we will discuss in the section “Global Market” below.

Such specialized websites do not exist in the Ukrainian and Russian segments of the Internet (there are over 240 million users in these segments in total). The main players in this location are trading platforms specializing in the sale of the most demanded categories of goods, i.e. typical bulletin boards.

In fact, Leox.red just alters dramatically (in comparison with other portals in this location) the so-called “forming the product range” to occupy its niche in the category “selling specialized products”. Therefore, while starting to develop our business, we accepted the hypothesis of the need for such a business as confirmed, but still, in order to reveal consumers and verify them further, we have conducted a comprehensive research of the market and its depth.

We have carried out a statistical monitoring of the potential sellers of goods in the social networks VK.com and FB (they were selected for the research, first of all, because of the large scale, and secondly, because the users are required to specify their hobby for the development of communication links), as well as analyzing the existing shopping portals.

For instance, on VK.com (as of 15 July 2016, its average daily audience is 64,525,950 visitors), the largest number of the people who specified “arts and crafts” as their hobby were in the categories: “Hand Embroidery” and “Hand Bead Embroidery” - the coverage of the top five such hobby groups was 980,705 people or 1.52% of the total audience. In the category “Hand-Painted Pictures”, the same selection indicator for the top five groups showed 316,488 people.

Since one person (no matter if he/she is an artist or just a person interested in art) is usually a member of about three of such groups simultaneously (but not more than four), the average number of the people interested in this topic was 393,088. This figure includes the people who like creating pictures (of all types) and the buyers of such pictures (who purchase certain finished paintings or order an artist to paint a particular picture), as well as potential buyers who have never made any deals before.

Every ninth person of the above number considers him-/herself to be an artist. Thus, the total number of artists in the top five such groups is 43,676 people. The majority of them are geographically located in Ukraine, Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan.

Important note. The average age of the users of this social network is 26 years. The users aged 35+ and 40+ are the minority in this network. However, they represent a huge amount of people interested in selling works of art.

As for Facebook, 1900 people from Ukraine have joined the active groups related to selling goods in the category “Oil Paintings” (7 largest groups), while in the categories “Hand Embroidery” and “Hand Bead Embroidery” - 5,385 people.

On the whole, in Ukraine alone, there are 5,864 people aged 19-26 years who create paintings at a level sufficient for selling.

These figures are also confirmed by the largest trading platforms in Ukraine - olx.ua and bigl.ua. For example, as of 21.11.2016, 38,220 ads were posted in the category “Paintings”, where one ad is one lot, i.e. one painting. Taking into account that, according to the above statistical surveys, one active artist always has more than 7 finished pictures and he/she posts on average 4 of them only, we can see that the total number of the artists who are actively selling their works in Ukraine are approximately 9,555 (4,170 of them are the people who are out of the age group of 19-26 years).

In Russia and Belarus, these figures were 28,394 and 2,714 people respectively. Another 3,013 people who have the potential to sell existing paintings are those who speak Russian but do not reside in the territory of these three countries.

As we see, Leox.red is in demand among young people, students and those who graduated from a high school no later than 5 years ago. It is the most active segment of the population in any country, the people who are looking for their place in this world and have something to offer to it. In order to make their dream come true, they have to show their works to as many potential buyers as possible, and opening a specialized portal for them would be akin to a breath of fresh air.

The second category of people who will be interested in Leox.red (they are fewer than the above) are older people who are already fulfilled, have sufficient experience and, most likely, well-established social connections to promote their works.

Economic indicators

We have set the break-even point for the project. It is the least real achievable goal under the worst conditions of attracting active artists. It will be 5 months after the launch date of the portal. It is the deadline that we must make as short as possible, and all our calculations are based on the worst market conditions. The pricing tactics for the rent of lots was calculated in detail and takes into account the psychological features of the selected category of customers, as well as the real quality of life in the countries where Leox.red will start operating.

Thus, in order to achieve the break-even point within the first 5 months since the portal launch, Leox.red is to encourage people to post 8,200 items per month (hereinafter referred to as “lpm”), i.e. to have approximately 2,050 registered artists with an average placement rate of over 4 lpm.

Actually, it means that at the first stage, we have to attract at least 4.7% of the local artists who are now posting their lots on other trading portals.

Therefore, any actions resulting in the exceed of 8,200 lpm will draw nearer the break-even point, while a smaller number of items posted will be extending the 5-month term.

At the same time, it is important to remember that up to this point we have been talking about the works of art in the category “Paintings” only. We have absolutely not considered the categories “Jewelry” and “Accessories”, which already have about 9,000 lots on the above trading platforms, as well as other categories, which do not exceed 5% in total of the category “Paintings” (i.e. approx. 1900 items).

To sum up, taking into consideration the information set forth above, we estimate the today’s width of the market of craft products in Ukraine alone as 49,120 lpm, in Russia - 141,970 lpm and in Belarus - 13,570 lpm.

Accordingly, the marketing campaign at the first stage will be focused simultaneously on the active artists of Ukraine, Russia and Belarus.

At the same time, the goal of the campaign for Term 1 is to attract 17% of the users of other trading platforms in the category “Works of Art” in the three countries covered by Leox.red or numerically - 34,793 lpm.

 

Why is Leox.red better than others?

In the current situation, when there are players in the market who enable users to post ads for sale, it seems it is pointless to get engaged in this struggle. This is what I heard from my former colleagues over and over again. But that is not really true. I would like to assure you of our competitiveness.

I. Local market. What do the leading trading platforms offer in the countries where Leox.red will be presented during the first period?

All the trading platforms in the starting location can be subdivided for our purpose into the following two categories:

1. Those that offer to post items for free (free ads), such as: olx.ua, aviso.ua, avito.ru, objavlenij.net, rusale.net, irr.ru

2. Those that charge for posting items (ads with price formula), such as: bigl.ua, haubau.com.ua, meshok.net, megalot.com

First of all, it should be noted that the above platforms do not have “Art” as a separate category on their landing page, which complicates greatly the search for the items you need.

For instance, on OLX, the most popular trading platform for free ads in the domain .ua, (it is also one of the most popular trading platforms in the world, since it has portals in many countries, e.g. the US, Brazil, Russia, Ukraine, China), the sale of works of art are hidden in the category “Antiques/Collections”, which is accessed through the section “Hobby, Recreation and Sports”.

Similarly, on bigl.ua, the most popular platform for “ads with price formula”, the sale of paintings can be found at the address: “Home and Garden” ® “Décor” ® “Paintings”.

Second, the above websites do not provide a more detailed categorization of art depending on the style in which they are created. This is logical, since you have already had to click four links in order to just find a list of paintings.

Third, the platforms for free ads rely on the number of visits to their page, which is why the main target audience of such websites is the buyers and sellers of cars, household appliances and computer equipment. The marketing strategy of these platforms is also based on the principle of not focusing on a specific target group. “Everything for everyone” is the basic principle of such websites. They get monetized by advertising, which often turns their pages into heaps of pop-ups and intrusive banners.

Fourth, even though the platforms for “ads with price formula” provide less advertising, they also focus on massive participation and, in addition to the fee for posting an item, they often charge a fixed percentage of the value of a posted item after its sale (hence the name of the type of such platforms, because this percentage paid by the seller to the trading platform is calculated by a specific formula for each category of goods). This approach is often not beneficial for the sellers of works of art compared to the sellers of factory-made products, who sell goods in large quantities. Leox.red is not going to charge the percentage of a deal.

Fifth and most important, the strategic goal of all the above websites is to cover as many users as possible within one country. They achieve this goal by increasing the number of the categories of goods sold and by attracting new users. The drawback of such a wide coverage is that the link “buyer-seller” does not work outside the country where the portal is registered due to the complexity of communication between the users, as well as due to the difference of customs procedures for different types of goods in different countries. In order to enter new markets, such companies have to register new entities in other countries, to recruit staff and do all the same thing - get deeper into the local market by attracting as many users as possible. Naturally, such actions result in the increase of the operating costs.

In contrast, we may define the position of Leox.red as “Unique for All” and plan to increase the number of users by a wider geographical coverage, rather than by a deep localization. The fee paid by the users to the portal will provide them with support and marketing services, as well as with the capability of selecting the amount of advertising on their pages. These services will be unavailable if the fee is not paid.

 

II. Global Market

The trading platform Leox.red will be designed in such a way that any information about an item entered will be automatically displayed to the users in the language they selected as the main one when entering the portal.

At the first stage, the platform will be offering its users to select one of the four languages available: Ukrainian, Russian, English and Spanish.

The major competitors are as follows:

- etsy.com – 40 000 000 lots and 104,509 artists 1.7M active sellers

- artmajeur.com - 1,820,182 lots and 104,509 artists

- saatchiart.com - 166,631 lots and 50,000 artists

- milanuncios.com - 50,617 lots and 15,338 artists

- artenet.es - 14,056 lots and 4,685 artists

The above platforms have some disadvantages. Leox.red plans to occupy a niche in this market by eliminating these disadvantages.

One of these drawbacks is charging an artist a percentage of the cost of their item sold (it should also be not less than a certain fixed amount), which is not profitable when selling low-cost paintings (cheaper than $200) (no flexible pricing policy).

Second. There is no sufficient marketing support of such portals in Russian speaking countries. The main buyers of paintings here are the collectors who found out about these websites through internal channels. The chain of selling paintings to design studios and directly to entities is extremely inefficient. It is impossible to single out some young artist here out of their total number.

Third. Only one of these websites (saatchiart.com) generates its own social life (exhibitions, meetings with authors, etc.), yet in English-speaking countries only. Leox.red is going to increase the coverage of such events.

 

Project implementation timing:

• Raising funds and (in case it is successful due to your help) transferring them to the project team - by 21 January 2017

• Incorporation of the company: 23 January to 31 January 2017

• All stages of creating the portal: 31 January to 28 April 2017

• Launching the portal: from 1 May 2017

• Reaching the break-even point: by 2 October 2017

 

What we need?

The most important thing in this category is to realize that Leox.red will be implementing finished business solutions, and accordingly, the cycles and stages of its formation will differ from the typical cycles of start-ups. Therefore, the costs will include the value of the product creation, expenses on setting up the company and the first marketing steps to enter the market.

Besides, of course, an operating enterprise needs the following monthly expenses (they are now planned in the cost of the project and will last until the break-even point of the enterprise): salary of the employees to be hired, costs associated with the maintenance of the portal and company for 7 months.

An important part of the costs will be the compulsory payments made to the platform Indiegogo.com and payment processor fees. According to the terms and conditions of the crowdfunding platform, if you raise funds, the following fees will be applied: 5% Indiegogo platform fee and payment processor fees (5% per  processor). Campaigns with bank accounts outside the US will also have a $25 bank transfer fee. The beneficiary bank of the project team will also charge its commission.

Therefore, about 11% of the funds raised will be spent on the compulsory payments.

* PERKS can be made immediately after the campaign.

** PERKS can be redeemed from the operating portal, i.e. after May 1

Social obligations:

3% of the amount collected will be allocated for direct support of people and organizations that help homeless animals in Kyiv region, Ukraine. After creating the website such payments will be increased and will be conducted on an ongoing basis.

 

What has already been done and what our team is doing at the moment

We have:

- created the concept of the portal and the statement of work to design it

- calculated the economic aspects of the portal’s pricing policy

- prepared all the legal documents needed to set up the company and run it

- created the graphical elements of the corporate design of Leox.red

We are:

- negotiating with the national postal operator of Ukraine about our future cooperation regarding postal delivery of the works of art

- developing a schedule of meetings with the students of art schools in Ukraine and the program of such events

- developing a schedule of meetings with business representatives interested to cooperate with our portal

 

PERKS!

All the PERKS will be delivered in original gift packaging.

Please note that all the PERKS will be dispatched to the backers after the official launch of the website, i.e. after 1 May 2017.

The PERKS with declared value will be redeemed after they are posted on the portal, and therefore the dispatch date of such goods may be substantially postponed from the above date. This condition fully applies to the category “Gratitude of the Society”.

 

Ways that you can help

If you like this idea, but its category is not the one that you would like to invest in - no problem! We would be grateful for any help from you - advice, practical assistance for implementation and, of course, sharing the information on this project in social networks. Perhaps your friends will get interested!

 

Why should I help?

We believe that the world where creative people can realize their potential, and other people can enjoy beautiful individual works of art is the best world. To feel that you are part of this is unspeakable joy!

When this project is implemented, we are sure thousands of artists will feel very much grateful that Leox.red, a powerful tool for personal growth, has been created by joint efforts and has taken up the majority of the problems associated with the promotion of such talents.

 

Risks & Challenges

We fully realize what risks and challenges we are facing. In order to become known and prove our competitiveness, we have to do more than our best. After all, the rules of the business environment have never forgiven mistakes.

Even though we have extensive experience in this field, we will always keep our doors open to new ideas and solutions. The flexibility of our business policy will consist in constant control over all our actions and prompt response to any difficulties encountered.

We will be pleased to accept advice from all the people who sincerely wish success to our business. Furthermore, we do need criticism, since sensible criticism and a hard-boiled appraisal of the situation only can become a basis for making right decisions!

 

What happens if we do not raise the required amount?

The amount specified here is the minimum we need to create such a portal. Therefore, we have launched a fixed goal campaign to raise funds, because no one wants to shamefully hide their eyes if we undertake to set up this business without having set the necessary funds in full and then fail to fulfill our promise. So, if we do not raise the required amount, all the money will be returned to the backers.

But if that happens, no one is going to sit on their hands. We will review our business model, improve it properly and continue to seek funds for its implementation.

At the same time, we believe that our idea of ​​creating a specialized portal for gifted creative people will find an echo in every man’s heart.

 

Thank you!

In fact, Leox.red just alters dramatically (in comparison with other portals in this location) the so-called “forming the product range” to occupy its niche in the category “selling specialized products”. Therefore, while starting to develop our business, we accepted the hypothesis of the need for such a business as confirmed, but still, in order to reveal consumers and verify them further, we have conducted a comprehensive research of the market and its depth.
We have carried out a statistical monitoring of the potential sellers of goods in the social networks VK.com and FB (they were selected for the research, first of all, because of the large scale, and secondly, because the users are required to specify their hobby for the development of communication links), as well as analyzing the existing shopping portals.
For instance, on VK.com (as of 15 July 2016, its average daily audience is 64,525,950 visitors), the largest number of the people who specified “arts and crafts” as their hobby were in the categories: “Hand Embroidery” and “Hand Bead Embroidery” - the coverage of the top five such hobby groups was 980,705 people or 1.52% of the total audience. In the category “Hand-Painted Pictures”, the same selection indicator for the top five groups showed 316,488 people.
Since one person (no matter if he/she is an artist or just a person interested in art) is usually a member of about three of such groups simultaneously (but not more than four), the average number of the people interested in this topic was 393,088. This figure includes the people who like creating pictures (of all types) and the buyers of such pictures (who purchase certain finished paintings or order an artist to paint a particular picture), as well as potential buyers who have never made any deals before.
Every ninth person of the above number considers him-/herself to be an artist. Thus, the total number of artists in the top five such groups is 43,676 people. The majority of them are geographically located in Ukraine, Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan.
Important note. The average age of the users of this social network is 26 years. The users aged 35+ and 40+ are the minority in this network. However, they represent a huge amount of people interested in selling works of art.
As for Facebook, 1900 people from Ukraine have joined the active groups related to selling goods in the category “Oil Paintings” (7 largest groups), while in the categories “Hand Embroidery” and “Hand Bead Embroidery” - 5,385 people.
On the whole, in Ukraine alone, there are 5,864 people aged 19-26 years who create paintings at a level sufficient for selling.
These figures are also confirmed by the largest trading platforms in Ukraine - olx.ua and bigl.ua. For example, as of 21.11.2016, 38,220 ads were posted in the category “Paintings”, where one ad is one lot, i.e. one painting. Taking into account that, according to the above statistical surveys, one active artist always has more than 7 finished pictures and he/she posts on average 4 of them only, we can see that the total number of the artists who are actively selling their works in Ukraine are approximately 9,555 (4,170 of them are the people who are out of the age group of 19-26 years).
In Russia and Belarus, these figures were 28,394 and 2,714 people respectively. Another 3,013 people who have the potential to sell existing paintings are those who speak Russian but do not reside in the territory of these three countries.
As we see, Leox.red is in demand among young people, students and those who graduated from a high school no later than 5 years ago. It is the most active segment of the population in any country, the people who are looking for their place in this world and have something to offer to it. In order to make their dream come true, they have to show their works to as many potential buyers as possible, and opening a specialized portal for them would be akin to a breath of fresh air.
The second category of people who will be interested in Leox.red (they are fewer than the above) are older people who are already fulfilled, have sufficient experience and, most likely, well-established social connections to promote their works.
Economic indicators
We have set the break-even point for the project. It is the least real achievable goal under the worst conditions of attracting active artists. It will be 5 months after the launch date of the portal. It is the deadline that we must make as short as possible, and all our calculations are based on the worst market conditions. The pricing tactics for the rent of lots was calculated in detail and takes into account the psychological features of the selected category of customers, as well as the real quality of life in the countries where Leox.red will start operating.
Thus, in order to achieve the break-even point within the first 5 months since the portal launch, Leox.red is to encourage people to post 8,200 items per month (hereinafter referred to as “lpm”), i.e. to have approximately 2,050 registered artists with an average placement rate of over 4 lpm.
Actually, it means that at the first stage, we have to attract at least 4.7% of the local artists who are now posting their lots on other trading portals.
Therefore, any actions resulting in the exceed of 8,200 lpm will draw nearer the break-even point, while a smaller number of items posted will be extending the 5-month term.
At the same time, it is important to remember that up to this point we have been talking about the works of art in the category “Paintings” only. We have absolutely not considered the categories “Jewelry” and “Accessories”, which already have about 9,000 lots on the above trading platforms, as well as other categories, which do not exceed 5% in total of the category “Paintings” (i.e. approx. 1900 items).
To sum up, taking into consideration the information set forth above, we estimate the today’s width of the market of craft products in Ukraine alone as 49,120 lpm, in Russia - 141,970 lpm and in Belarus - 13,570 lpm.
Accordingly, the marketing campaign at the first stage will be focused simultaneously on the active artists of Ukraine, Russia and Belarus.
At the same time, the goal of the campaign for Term 1 is to attract 17% of the users of other trading platforms in the category “Works of Art” in the three countries covered by Leox.red or numerically - 34,793 lpm.

 
Why is Leox.red better than others?
In the current situation, when there are players in the market who enable users to post ads for sale, it seems it is pointless to get engaged in this struggle. This is what I heard from my former colleagues over and over again. But that is not really true. I would like to assure you of our competitiveness.
I. Local market. What do the leading trading platforms offer in the countries where Leox.red will be presented during the first period?
All the trading platforms in the starting location can be subdivided for our purpose into the following two categories:
1. Those that offer to post items for free (free ads), such as: olx.ua, aviso.ua, avito.ru, objavlenij.net, rusale.net, irr.ru
2. Those that charge for posting items (ads with price formula), such as: bigl.ua, haubau.com.ua, meshok.net, megalot.com
First of all, it should be noted that the above platforms do not have “Art” as a separate category on their landing page, which complicates greatly the search for the items you need.
For instance, on OLX, the most popular trading platform for free ads in the domain .ua, (it is also one of the most popular trading platforms in the world, since it has portals in many countries, e.g. the US, Brazil, Russia, Ukraine, China), the sale of works of art are hidden in the category “Antiques/Collections”, which is accessed through the section “Hobby, Recreation and Sports”.
Similarly, on bigl.ua, the most popular platform for “ads with price formula”, the sale of paintings can be found at the address: “Home and Garden” ® “Décor” ® “Paintings”.
Second, the above websites do not provide a more detailed categorization of art depending on the style in which they are created. This is logical, since you have already had to click four links in order to just find a list of paintings.
Third, the platforms for free ads rely on the number of visits to their page, which is why the main target audience of such websites is the buyers and sellers of cars, household appliances and computer equipment. The marketing strategy of these platforms is also based on the principle of not focusing on a specific target group. “Everything for everyone” is the basic principle of such websites. They get monetized by advertising, which often turns their pages into heaps of pop-ups and intrusive banners.
Fourth, even though the platforms for “ads with price formula” provide less advertising, they also focus on massive participation and, in addition to the fee for posting an item, they often charge a fixed percentage of the value of a posted item after its sale (hence the name of the type of such platforms, because this percentage paid by the seller to the trading platform is calculated by a specific formula for each category of goods). This approach is often not beneficial for the sellers of works of art compared to the sellers of factory-made products, who sell goods in large quantities. Leox.red is not going to charge the percentage of a deal.
Fifth and most important, the strategic goal of all the above websites is to cover as many users as possible within one country. They achieve this goal by increasing the number of the categories of goods sold and by attracting new users. The drawback of such a wide coverage is that the link “buyer-seller” does not work outside the country where the portal is registered due to the complexity of communication between the users, as well as due to the difference of customs procedures for different types of goods in different countries. In order to enter new markets, such companies have to register new entities in other countries, to recruit staff and do all the same thing - get deeper into the local market by attracting as many users as possible. Naturally, such actions result in the increase of the operating costs.
In contrast, we may define the position of Leox.red as “Unique for All” and plan to increase the number of users by a wider geographical coverage, rather than by a deep localization. The fee paid by the users to the portal will provide them with support and marketing services, as well as with the capability of selecting the amount of advertising on their pages. These services will be unavailable if the fee is not paid.
 
II. Global Market
The trading platform Leox.red will be designed in such a way that any information about an item entered will be automatically displayed to the users in the language they selected as the main one when entering the portal.
At the first stage, the platform will be offering its users to select one of the four languages available: Ukrainian, Russian, English and Spanish.
The major competitors are as follows:
- etsy.com – 40 000 000 lots and 104,509 artists 1.7M active sellers
- artmajeur.com - 1,820,182 lots and 104,509 artists
- saatchiart.com - 166,631 lots and 50,000 artists
- milanuncios.com - 50,617 lots and 15,338 artists
- artenet.es - 14,056 lots and 4,685 artists
The above platforms have some disadvantages. Leox.red plans to occupy a niche in this market by eliminating these disadvantages.
One of these drawbacks is charging an artist a percentage of the cost of their item sold (it should also be not less than a certain fixed amount), which is not profitable when selling low-cost paintings (cheaper than $200) (no flexible pricing policy).
Second. There is no sufficient marketing support of such portals in Russian speaking countries. The main buyers of paintings here are the collectors who found out about these websites through internal channels. The chain of selling paintings to design studios and directly to entities is extremely inefficient. It is impossible to single out some young artist here out of their total number.
Third. Only one of these websites (saatchiart.com) generates its own social life (exhibitions, meetings with authors, etc.), yet in English-speaking countries only. Leox.red is going to increase the coverage of such events.
 
Project implementation timing:
• Raising funds and (in case it is successful due to your help) transferring them to the project team - by 21 January 2017
• Incorporation of the company: 23 January to 31 January 2017
• All stages of creating the portal: 31 January to 28 April 2017
• Launching the portal: from 1 May 2017
• Reaching the break-even point: by 2 October 2017
 
What we need?
The most important thing in this category is to realize that Leox.red will be implementing finished business solutions, and accordingly, the cycles and stages of its formation will differ from the typical cycles of start-ups. Therefore, the costs will include the value of the product creation, expenses on setting up the company and the first marketing steps to enter the market.
Besides, of course, an operating enterprise needs the following monthly expenses (they are now planned in the cost of the project and will last until the break-even point of the enterprise): salary of the employees to be hired, costs associated with the maintenance of the portal and company for 7 months.
An important part of the costs will be the compulsory payments made to the platform Indiegogo.com and payment processor fees. According to the terms and conditions of the crowdfunding platform, if you raise funds, the following fees will be applied: 5% Indiegogo platform fee and payment processor fees (5% per  processor). Campaigns with bank accounts outside the US will also have a $25 bank transfer fee. The beneficiary bank of the project team will also charge its commission.
Therefore, about 11% of the funds raised will be spent on the compulsory payments.


* PERKS can be made immediately after the campaign.
** PERKS can be redeemed from the operating portal, i.e. after May 1
Social obligations:
3% of the amount collected will be allocated for direct support of people and organizations that help homeless animals in Kyiv region, Ukraine. After creating the website such payments will be increased and will be conducted on an ongoing basis.

 
What has already been done and what our team is doing at the moment
We have:
- created the concept of the portal and the statement of work to design it
- calculated the economic aspects of the portal’s pricing policy
- prepared all the legal documents needed to set up the company and run it
- created the graphical elements of the corporate design of Leox.red
We are:
- negotiating with the national postal operator of Ukraine about our future cooperation regarding postal delivery of the works of art
- developing a schedule of meetings with the students of art schools in Ukraine and the program of such events
- developing a schedule of meetings with business representatives interested to cooperate with our portal
 
PERKS!
All the PERKS will be delivered in original gift packaging.
Please note that all the PERKS will be dispatched to the backers after the official launch of the website, i.e. after 1 May 2017.
The PERKS with declared value will be redeemed after they are posted on the portal, and therefore the dispatch date of such goods may be substantially postponed from the above date. This condition fully applies to the category “Gratitude of the Society”.
 
Ways that you can help
If you like this idea, but its category is not the one that you would like to invest in - no problem! We would be grateful for any help from you - advice, practical assistance for implementation and, of course, sharing the information on this project in social networks. Perhaps your friends will get interested!
 
Why should I help?
We believe that the world where creative people can realize their potential, and other people can enjoy beautiful individual works of art is the best world. To feel that you are part of this is unspeakable joy!
When this project is implemented, we are sure thousands of artists will feel very much grateful that Leox.red, a powerful tool for personal growth, has been created by joint efforts and has taken up the majority of the problems associated with the promotion of such talents.
 
Risks & Challenges
We fully realize what risks and challenges we are facing. In order to become known and prove our competitiveness, we have to do more than our best. After all, the rules of the business environment have never forgiven mistakes.
Even though we have extensive experience in this field, we will always keep our doors open to new ideas and solutions. The flexibility of our business policy will consist in constant control over all our actions and prompt response to any difficulties encountered.
We will be pleased to accept advice from all the people who sincerely wish success to our business. Furthermore, we do need criticism, since sensible criticism and a hard-boiled appraisal of the situation only can become a basis for making right decisions!
 
What happens if we do not raise the required amount?
The amount specified here is the minimum we need to create such a portal. Therefore, we have launched a fixed goal campaign to raise funds, because no one wants to shamefully hide their eyes if we undertake to set up this business without having set the necessary funds in full and then fail to fulfill our promise. So, if we do not raise the required amount, all the money will be returned to the backers.
But if that happens, no one is going to sit on their hands. We will review our business model, improve it properly and continue to seek funds for its implementation.
At the same time, we believe that our idea of ​​creating a specialized portal for gifted creative people will find an echo in every man’s heart.
 
Thank you!

story:
Who are We?

The circus troupe"Igrachka-Plachko" is formed in the beginning of 2014 as a common street project between two clowns from Bulgaria Mila (Igrachka) and Tihomir (Plachko). The show is a mix,like genre,between theater and circus and combines a 2 cups of of laugh, 1  teaspoon fear, 1 and a 1/2  cups of interactive games with the audience, mixed with skills and balance. Igrachka and Plachko start to play games, juggle, ride the dangerous unicycle, but one of them always try to cheat the other and to show that is better one. That brings a few comic situations on the stage and as it happens in real life sometimes,everything becomes a big mess. The show is suitable as for the little ones so for the their parents.

The performance, including 3 parts. First one makes the audience be relaxed and entered with curiosity to the world of circus.It includes gentle soap bubbles ​​, combined with contact juggling and beautiful acrobatic forms. The second sketch is interactive, with the participation of a volunteer from the audience. The third one is the most dynamic. The audience can enjoy the fast juggling and the controlling the most dangerous wheel-giraffe in the world.

 The circus participated in imoprtant international street and theater festivals -

-2018: MiniArt Fest(Sofia,Bulgaria), Murenschalk (Bruck and der Mur,Austria)
-2017: J-FEST,12 Turkish Juggling Convention(Antalya, Turkey),
Murenschalk(Bruck and der Mur, Austria)
-2016:Busker Bus(Poland:Wroclaw,Zielona Gora,Zgorzelec,Krotoszyn),Carnaval Sztukmistrzow (Lublin,Poland),Sofia Puppet Fair(Sofia,Bulgaria),"International Children's Easter Festival Bosilegrad''(Bosilegrad,Serbia)
-2015:Theatair(Plovdiv ,Bulgaria)

What We Need and What You Get

We need 3000$ to buy van!

This is our virtual hat.If you put in it some money,you receive educational tutorials create by us for circus arts.For each amount with which you fund us ,you receive all other tutorials ,which are under that amount.

10$ Thank you e-mail

20$ Tutorial "How to make giant bubbles at home"

30$ Tutorial "How to juggle with flower stick"

50$ Tutorial "Learn how to juggle with 3 balls" part 1

70$ Tutorial "How to do basic tricks with 3 balls" part2

100$ Tutorial "Leran how to play 4 balls" part 3

120$ Tutorial "Learn how to play with contact ball" part 1 

150$Tutorial "Learn how to do tricks with contact ball" part 2 

200$ Tutorial "How to do passing with clubs"

300$ FULL video show of Igrachka-Plachko Circus

story:
Why Lebanon and Bet Chabab?

Creating with clay, one of earth's most abundant raw materials, is an ancient process. Clay has been used to create household objects as well as purely aesthetic work.

Pottery requires skill, it always puts you in front of surprises, every type of clay holds its color and its characteristics and consequences after being heated to perfection. It is a long and continuous dialogue with nature , it is the art of knowing the material and dealing with them and controlling them by giving them shape and color.

Archaeologists have unearthed pottery up to 3,000 years in southern Lebanon that ancient Phoenicians used to bury the remains of the dead after cremation. The pottery dates to between 700 and 900 BC when Phoenician traders flourished on the eastern coast of the Mediterranean. Originating from what is now Lebanon, the Phoenicians were early seafarers who spread their culture to other countries around the region.

The village of Bet Chabab is located at 30Km from Beirut (Capital Of Lebanon), and is home to the timid survival of this ancient prosperous craft. Here ,Fawzi Fakhouri, The Pottery Man of beit Chabab, is the last remaining craftsman, who makes pottery the Beit Chabab's way, a way unique in the entire world, that combines the use of the pottery wheel together with a natural clay roll.

He creates each by hand, with a very difficult technique and involves hard manual labour.

What are we pitching?

 

 

 

ALL ITEMS ARE:

  1. HANDMADE with care
  2. 100% NATURAL  using bet Chabab's rare clay
  3. HIGH QUALITY and distinguished from modern pottery where different type of clay is used alongside other chemicals.
  4. GREAT VALUE
  5. Carry the Lebanese symbol (Cedar)               
  6. Guaranteed safe packing for fragile items

Your contribution is valuable

You share, you back, you make a difference, you spread love, by reviving this art and helping charity

We are offering a special pottery wheel for people with disabilities to learn this craft.

  

One wheel will be donated To Lebanese Autism Society upon reaching our goal.

Lebanese Autism Society  –LAS is a non-governmental organization.The LAS was founded by parents of and professionals working with Autism. LAS is a founding member and the coordinator of the Arab Network for Autism (ANA). LAS is also a member of different national and international organizations such as AutismEurope, World Autism Organization, United Nation Global Compact.

Our Team

     Mohamad AL SAYYED

     Jad AMHAZ

    FB PAGE: https://www.facebook.com/pottery213/

    THERE IS ALWAYS A WAY YOU CAN HELP

    If you just can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help

    Just spread love and our word by simply sharing the campaign

story:
Hello, nice to meet you! This is me, all me and some extra

My name is Tessa and art is in my veins. I could not live without it, even if I wanted to. But luckily that is far from what my plans are anyway.

My story started when I was a little child. Why play with toys when you have pencils at your disposal? I drew for hours and hours every day. Eventually, it could really not be avoided, I went to art school but sadly I could never complete this due to unforseen circumstances. Sometimes live just goes like that but that does not mean giving up is an option.

I kept developing the valuable skills I had learned and today I am proud of what I have achieved. Never have I felt so ready to start selling the art that I create: fantasy and realistic art (portraits), sometimes combined, in several media types combined: both traditional and digital. I did certainly not sit still and you could say that I am a chameleon.

But although I am motivated and a hard worker, I could really use a little boost to get started. People around me keep telling me that there is no harm in asking for help and that there are some wonderful souls out there. That is why I am putting my trust in them and everyone reading this request. 

 

Back to the point and an insight on goodies

The funds requested will be used to buy an Epson DS-50000 scanner. It is only the top of the iceberg but, in essence, it is what I need to get the ball rolling. This scanner will allow me to do the following:

  • Scan art so I can promote myself better on social platforms and my own website
  • Once I have a quality scan, I can start selling originals. Based on how popular they are already, I don't expect issues with that.
  • I will be able to reproduce my art: quality prints, stickers, bussiness cards, promotional material, ... and a random act of kindness every now and then.
  • Sell digital copies of my art
  • Offer tutorials and rewards on Patreon

In the event that I don't reach the funding goal, I will put any funds collected aside and keep saving until I reach the goal by other means. I have a fulltime job and with careful budgetting I can keep some money aside. It would take a very long time but with faith and a goal in mind, anything can be achieved!

Now if the kindness of strangers was to stun me and I would collect more than the requested amount, all funds would go to the same main goal: building up a professional business. Being an artist is so much more than buying a few brushes, some paint and a canvas. For example, these days social media is an incredible important part of being an artist. And with it comes the need for professional recording and photo equipment.

Perk, perks, perks, ... yes, you read that correct! A lot of perks have been created for this campaign and they are all ready to go. Get ready to feast on original and unique art. And where possible, I will even keep everyone's preferences in mind. But keep in mind: since the originals are unique, only one of each exists so don't miss your chance!

A dream that keeps on giving

In case this wasn't obvious yet: becoming a professional artist is not just a goal but also a dream. But it doesn't stop there! Art can bring hope, make people dream, warm a heart, make a soul ponder. I have so much more to give and these are just a few of the things that I can share with the world. In return for your support, I will work even harder so your effort will not be wasted.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Now I understand that some people would love to help me out but are simply not able to contribute financially with the best will in the world. The fact that you already have this wish warms my heart more than you will ever know. But did you know there are also other ways you can support me?

 

  • You can share this campaign on your social media: spam away on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, your blog, ... and spread the word. Indiegogo even has a special share tool for just that purpose. I am not a big fan of spamming but you have my seal of approval this time. OK, I admit, I might even enjoy it to some degree.
  • Get your friends and family involved. The more the merrier! I am sure that someone owes you a favour and is dying to be released of that commitment. (Especially the people who want to repay it and you never asked for it. Here is your solution!) Or you are a lovely soul who just likes to do nice things. In both cases I would already like to express my grattitude anyway.
  • I am not saying that I want you to go to the end of the world for me. Just dropping my name here and there can do wonders. Don't worry, it doesn't break.

 

For anyone that took the time to read my request

 

Thank you from the bottom of my heart to have spend some of your valuable time on my humble request. If given the chance, I won't let you down. Enjoy the rest of your day and don't forget to smile!
story_txt:
Hello, nice to meet you! This is me, all me and some extra
My name is Tessa and art is in my veins. I could not live without it, even if I wanted to. But luckily that is far from what my plans are anyway.
My story started when I was a little child. Why play with toys when you have pencils at your disposal? I drew for hours and hours every day. Eventually, it could really not be avoided, I went to art school but sadly I could never complete this due to unforseen circumstances. Sometimes live just goes like that but that does not mean giving up is an option.
I kept developing the valuable skills I had learned and today I am proud of what I have achieved. Never have I felt so ready to start selling the art that I create: fantasy and realistic art (portraits), sometimes combined, in several media types combined: both traditional and digital. I did certainly not sit still and you could say that I am a chameleon.
But although I am motivated and a hard worker, I could really use a little boost to get started. People around me keep telling me that there is no harm in asking for help and that there are some wonderful souls out there. That is why I am putting my trust in them and everyone reading this request. 

 

Back to the point and an insight on goodies
The funds requested will be used to buy an Epson DS-50000 scanner. It is only the top of the iceberg but, in essence, it is what I need to get the ball rolling. This scanner will allow me to do the following:

Scan art so I can promote myself better on social platforms and my own website
Once I have a quality scan, I can start selling originals. Based on how popular they are already, I don't expect issues with that.
I will be able to reproduce my art: quality prints, stickers, bussiness cards, promotional material, ... and a random act of kindness every now and then.
Sell digital copies of my art
Offer tutorials and rewards on Patreon

In the event that I don't reach the funding goal, I will put any funds collected aside and keep saving until I reach the goal by other means. I have a fulltime job and with careful budgetting I can keep some money aside. It would take a very long time but with faith and a goal in mind, anything can be achieved!
Now if the kindness of strangers was to stun me and I would collect more than the requested amount, all funds would go to the same main goal: building up a professional business. Being an artist is so much more than buying a few brushes, some paint and a canvas. For example, these days social media is an incredible important part of being an artist. And with it comes the need for professional recording and photo equipment.
Perk, perks, perks, ... yes, you read that correct! A lot of perks have been created for this campaign and they are all ready to go. Get ready to feast on original and unique art. And where possible, I will even keep everyone's preferences in mind. But keep in mind: since the originals are unique, only one of each exists so don't miss your chance!


A dream that keeps on giving
In case this wasn't obvious yet: becoming a professional artist is not just a goal but also a dream. But it doesn't stop there! Art can bring hope, make people dream, warm a heart, make a soul ponder. I have so much more to give and these are just a few of the things that I can share with the world. In return for your support, I will work even harder so your effort will not be wasted.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
Now I understand that some people would love to help me out but are simply not able to contribute financially with the best will in the world. The fact that you already have this wish warms my heart more than you will ever know. But did you know there are also other ways you can support me?
 

You can share this campaign on your social media: spam away on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, your blog, ... and spread the word. Indiegogo even has a special share tool for just that purpose. I am not a big fan of spamming but you have my seal of approval this time. OK, I admit, I might even enjoy it to some degree.
Get your friends and family involved. The more the merrier! I am sure that someone owes you a favour and is dying to be released of that commitment. (Especially the people who want to repay it and you never asked for it. Here is your solution!) Or you are a lovely soul who just likes to do nice things. In both cases I would already like to express my grattitude anyway.
I am not saying that I want you to go to the end of the world for me. Just dropping my name here and there can do wonders. Don't worry, it doesn't break.

 
For anyone that took the time to read my request
 
Thank you from the bottom of my heart to have spend some of your valuable time on my humble request. If given the chance, I won't let you down. Enjoy the rest of your day and don't forget to smile!

story:
We are starting a small printing company for t-shirt, hat, shoes, canvas and any other type of garment printing with DTG machines.
There is no such shop yet in our city and people have to go out to other cities to print on those materials. We are prompted to start a fundraiser as it takes years to do this, sadly. We already have 40% of the amount we need to start our business, and we hope that people can help with this as we will produce not only for our county.

story:
When I started Sweet Charlotte’s a year ago,..

I had only one vision in mind.... to make enough money to be able to stay home with my daughter. A few months into that, I realized I wanted to do more. I wanted to open up a store that could help other small businesses and/or women going through what I was.

I opened up a store and soon realized there was so much more I could do... if I only had the tools to do it.

I am looking to relocate, renovate, and expand Sweet Charlotte’s Boutique. I want it to become a community based shop (even more so than it is now). I currently have nearly 100 other small businesses that display their work in my shop and I’ve worked with quite a few charities and nonprofits, but I want to do more.

Everyone deserves a creative outlet. Kids deserve to grow up around art. People deserve to reach their potential and succeed. 

I want to make that happen, but I can’t do it all alone.

What We Need & What You Get

Money raised during this will go towards the expansion and creating craft rooms and nights out for single mothers and their kids, animal rescues, firehalls, community nonprofits, and for my current and future artists to master their craft and excel.

Things that are needed and will be paid for from this fundraising include, but are not limited to:

-A new and bigger retail space
-New Laptop
-New security system
-Tables, chairs, microwaves, easels, and dishes for craft nights.
-Couches, dressers, shelving, and other display items for our artists.
-Paint, brushes, wood, string, and other craft supplies.

Nothing in life comes free. 
Every donation will get something back as my way of saying “Thank you!” Check out the perks of every donation on the right hand side of the screen!

If all the money we need is not raised, the money that is, will be used to buy as much of the things needed as possible1

The Impact

Art matters. Art has the ability to save lives. Art has the ability to send someone to college, to better their future. Why not help make that happen. We used our store as a means to raise almost $1,000 just in one fundraiser for an animal rescue in as little as 4 hours. We CAN make a difference, we all can help.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge right now is securing a space. All the other things can wait, but this cannot. My current lease is up soon, and this location does not have the space I need. If we do not find a space sooner than later, this won’t be able to happen. I have looked at several new places, but there are always other companies able to scoop them up quickly. I have the perfect place in mind, my heart is set on it and I KNOW you all would love it, but I can’t make this a reality, without YOU.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

If you are not able or willing to donate, you can always come to the shop I have now and treat yourself to something you can take home. Every physical purchase helps too!

If you aren’t local, or don’t want to purchase anything, a simple SHARE will help more than you can imagine.

story:
Paul Ukonu is one of Africa’s influential photographers. Born in Imo State, Nigeria in 1987, He is married with a son. Ukonu started his career at an early age. In the year 2009 he bought his 1st camera and started off as a documentary/event photographer. His vision has made him one of the much sought-after visual artist in the fashion industry today. His work has been featured across Africa in magazines from Complete Fashion to Exquisite, Glitz Africa, Thisday Style, Pride Magazine, Ghoste

and he has contributed to the success of many leading fashion houses and other major brands through advertising campaigns, from Etisalat, Fashpa, First Bank, House of Nwocha, Elan Red, Mai Atafo, Purple Campaign and more

MY IDEA

As photographer, I use my creativity as a tool to raise awareness on issues affecting young women in Africa. My primary focus is trafficking. It is getting out of control and we need to stop it. 

I will be gathering 300 strong and inspiring rural women from different states in the country (with the help of women empowerment NGOs in the states) who will come together for this artistic photoshoot to raise awareness on trafficking. The impact of bringing these women together to take an artistic portrait for the purpose of awareness will have a huge impact and send signals to individuals and governments around the world.

NEEDS 

These are the urgent needs to go past the 2nd stage of the project 

- Mini Documentary for the selected women

- Set design of the photoshoot 

- Outfits for the 300 women

We need to raise $5,000 to go past the 2nd phase of this project. 

THE IMPACT

The 300 Project will get the attention of the United Nations, European Union and other Governments. This will further propel them to take more action. I am approaching this photoshoot from an extremely emotional angle and I am certain that this project will have the much needed impact.

My team will be documenting our everyday journey to make sure all our contributors see our step by step project. Let's do this together 

PROJECT RISKS

Projects of these magnitude comes with alot of risks. In doing this kind of project you have to learn to withstand pressure. As a photographer I have handled huge campaigns for top organizations in Nigeria, I have done major campaigns for banks, telecoms, government agencies and other organizations. When it comes to execution I never back down. 

One of the challenges is getting these women to come together. I have sorted that out by involving NGOs and individuals from various parts of Nigeria. We are also doing local ads in communities and we have asked the general public to nominated to nominate. 

 

Thanks

story:
Short Summary

An artist of South Carolina. Pray For Your City is a campaign running to inspire people of their city to pray. Paper art sculptures are designed in different themes to be shared across the city on different billboards. Each billboard is sponsored by the community. Support your city by contributing to this cause.  

  • Our communities need prayer more than ever right now. Prayer can cover, protect, and bring to life a city. 
  • Each vibrant billboard is designed to inspire and encourage people who live within Columbia, SC to pray as they pass by the billboards. 
  • The goal: 10 Pray For Your City Billboards on display throughout the city. 
  • By contributing to this cause you will impact thousands of people to not only pray but support the next Pray For Your City mission to inspire other cities to do the same. 

A healthy city is determined by its level of prayer. 

What We Need & What You Get

Break down:

  • Funding for this campaign will sponsor One (1) billboard in Columbia, SC on Broad River Rd. 
  • The cost for the billboard is $990
  • People driving through Columbia, SC will inspired to pray close to 308,800 times during the 4 weeks. 
  • All funding for this campaign will go directly towards sponsoring the next campaign for a billboard if we don't reach our entire goal.

The Impact

  • The world needs prayer and many other cities need to be reminded to pray and see how vibrant and lively their city looks in the spirit when they do pray. 
  • Viewers will be able to connect and join the campaign by connecting through PFYC online community. 
  • Billboards will be displayed for 4 weeks. 
  • The more billboards running with different themed Pray For Your City works of art, the more people will be inspired to pray. 

Risks & Challenges

There may be some challenges converting each paper sculpture into a visual billboard, but with the help of Pray For Your City team and Lamar services, these delays should be quickly overcome within a week.

Not all locations will be available at the same time, and only limited billboards are available at once. A solution for this will be to work with different billboards and spending adequate time discovering billboards with the closest proximity to the skyline of the city. 

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Spread the word by sharing this campaign. 
  • Stay connected with Pray For Your City online at https://www.facebook.com/communityPFYC
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Important Note: We are using open ended funding to allow for orders from different areas to add to the total. If we do not meet the goal, all donations will be promptly refunded. I know Indiegogo says we get to keep the money, but we don't work like that. 

 

Have you ever been watching an old movie or TV show from when you were a kid and thought to yourself "Wouldn't it be cool if someone actually made that."? 

I do that so much, it wound up becoming my job.  I build stuff like this for major theme parks, movies, TV shows, video games, etc. Whatever the client can think of, I can make.  But the one thing that's more fun than doing this professionally, is sharing with fellow fans. And that's what this project is about.  

Basically what I made is a theme park/ movie quality miniature that we're taking straight to the fans. Thousands of hours of sculpting, molding, casting, and painting to create that iconic 80's image of a living mechanical world, shrunk down to the size of a wall clock. 

This will be a limited production run, cast from my original masters. It will include translucent resin parts for the light-up city effect,  metallic paint, and die cast bridges and over 500 individual buildings. Size is 12-14 inches in diameter and 6 inches deep.  The statue is intended to be wall mounted or attached to the optional display stand. 

Disclaimer: The pictures shown are of my hand-cast originals with the custom display bases I made for them. The final product will differ somewhat and I will post pics as soon as we have them. Also we have not determined yet what the final factory display stand will look like and whether it will be included or an add-on. 

As I have already finished the sculpting and molding, this campaign is to fund the factory costs. While I can technically cast these myself, it is prohibitively expensive and so we are crowd funding a small factory run to make them affordable to everyone. 

To make this process as smooth as possible, we have already sent the factory the samples for molding. I don't like holding on to other people's money, so we want to get these into production and shipped as quickly as possible. Given our experience with factory runs in the past, there is a good chance that we will be able to have these delivered by this summer. 

 

PERKS: Yay stuff!

The main reward, obviously, will be a copy of the statue itself. A little planet all your own for you to bask in the nerdy goodness. 

 

We will also be offering a few fun add-ons like this God of Chaos satellite. 

  

I think it would be fun to offer the God of Chaos as a fridge magnet too. Maybe a rear window dangler. I'm open to ideas. 

As of now, we are planning on having a display stand included with the sculpt, but since this is primarily a wall hanging, we may have to add it as an extra. We're honestly not sure yet how that will play out so we wanted to be up front about it. 

And lastly, we want to give back to our fellow fans. We are including a $1 donation level that will automatically enter you to win one of the main rewards. We will be giving away 5 planet statues and an assortment of fridge magnets and other rewards. 

Risks: 

Although this in not intended to be a large run, the factory does require a minimum order amount. And while I'm a decent sculptor, I am terrible at social media and will need your help to make this happen. If we do not reach our goal, we will not be taking any money.
