story:
UPDATE!

For all tiers that include an action figure, you'll get an 11x17 poster of Cyko KO #1, signed by creator Rob Feldman!

 

 

Greetings from SuperEarth!

Hey! Rob Feldman here, writer, creator and illustrator of Cyko KO (PSYCHO-KAY-OH), a popular newsprint comic book series through Alterna Comics.  I've been writing and drawing Cyko KO for over 3 years now through Alterna, after its successful run on Line Webtoons as one of the first digital animated comics. It's an all-ages, fun Saturday morning type of comic inspired by the  early days of Hanna Barbera and Filmation.  Out of the three newsprint issues so far, both 1 and 2 are in their second printings! Additonally, Cyko KO was nominated for a Ringo Award in 2018 and I have 3 more issues due to hit shelves this year.  Here's an intro video with me and some cool intro music:

 


Who's this now and what does he do?

If you haven't heard of Cyko KO (PSYCHO-KAY-OH), he's an infectiously fun character that is great for kids and adults of all ages. He's a fourth-wall breakin', pinball-addicted, motorcycle-ridin' hero you've been waiting for! From the pages of the popular Alterna Comics newsprint series by Rob Feldman, I'm looking to turn Cyko into a 6-inch vinyl action figure, complete with 7 points of articulation (prototype does not show knees bending, but final figure will) and an awesome collectible. Here are some of the comics available through Alterna Comics:

As a backer, you have the chance to receive not only your only blister card packaged copy, but also get some cool perks, one of which includes an opportunity to see your name and possibly your likeness in print!  I've priced the perks carefully and hope that you will consider backing this project.

You need my money for what now?

Producing an action figure is not an easy task, but I just know you'll love the results.  This is the second figure I have produced (the first being a Dr. Shroud figure) and understand what it takes to get it from concept to your hands.  I am working with an overseas company who has already produced this awesome sample:

Where will the money go?

To get more of these done, at least 500, complete with packaging, will cost around $6,500.  This includes the mold ($3,500), production, packaging and shipping and roughly takes about 6-8 weeks for full delivery. I figured that it's an all or nothing thing since we need to hit certain production minimums so if we don't hit the goal, we can just go our separate ways and call it quits.  Which would be awful!

I have some cool perks here---of course you can get the figure, or two or three.  BUT since Cyko KO is going strong on Alterna's newsprint line, there are Perks to get the comics, stickers, a SuperEarth Action certificate and even a shoutout or your a walk-on role in one of the upcoming books!  That's right, I'll put you in the crowd or even go so far as to work on a character for one of the future comics coming out this year or next, deadline dependent of course. Plus, I have some awesome stretch goals planned if we hit the mark, like variants, more articulation and even an alternate suit! Here's the packaging mockup (not the final design):

(above graphic is a mockup only and not final)

This is a chance to have a unique collectible!  Heck, even if you haven't read the books---and you should---I think Cyko KO as a figure, even to hold and cherish, is something worth working for! NOTE: Prototype does not show articulation in the knees, but final figure will have 7 points of articulation!

Perks

There are some really fun Perks here---stickers, an Action Club Membership and even a chance to be in the comic!  Here are some visuals to help you out:

SuperEarth Action Club Certificate (8" x 10")

Front

Back

Sticker (3" x 3")

Sticker sized 3" x 3"

Cyko KO Volume 1 (Issues 1-3)

Comics are signed by Rob Feldman

 

Risks & Challenges

As soon as we have the full funding, we can start production.  The company I am working with is highly reputable, having produced many of the figures you have seen on the shelves. It takes about 6-8 weeks for completion and once they are done and in my hands, you'll get them soon after!

But like any good project, you know that there could always be unforeseen issues, particularly with shipping across the world, so there is that. Barring a natural disaster, man-made disaster, sickness, or death (and even then I've provided instructions for its continuation) your product will be delivered.

Other Ways You Can Help

And if you don't have the cashola now, no sweat, I get it.  But maybe  you would consider sharing the campaign through social media or even sharing it with someone you think might like this? I'd super appreciate it! In any event, thanks for reading this far!
story_txt:
UPDATE!
For all tiers that include an action figure, you'll get an 11x17 poster of Cyko KO #1, signed by creator Rob Feldman!

 

 
Greetings from SuperEarth!
Hey! Rob Feldman here, writer, creator and illustrator of Cyko KO (PSYCHO-KAY-OH), a popular newsprint comic book series through Alterna Comics.  I've been writing and drawing Cyko KO for over 3 years now through Alterna, after its successful run on Line Webtoons as one of the first digital animated comics. It's an all-ages, fun Saturday morning type of comic inspired by the  early days of Hanna Barbera and Filmation.  Out of the three newsprint issues so far, both 1 and 2 are in their second printings! Additonally, Cyko KO was nominated for a Ringo Award in 2018 and I have 3 more issues due to hit shelves this year.  Here's an intro video with me and some cool intro music:

 

Who's this now and what does he do?
If you haven't heard of Cyko KO (PSYCHO-KAY-OH), he's an infectiously fun character that is great for kids and adults of all ages. He's a fourth-wall breakin', pinball-addicted, motorcycle-ridin' hero you've been waiting for! From the pages of the popular Alterna Comics newsprint series by Rob Feldman, I'm looking to turn Cyko into a 6-inch vinyl action figure, complete with 7 points of articulation (prototype does not show knees bending, but final figure will) and an awesome collectible. Here are some of the comics available through Alterna Comics:

As a backer, you have the chance to receive not only your only blister card packaged copy, but also get some cool perks, one of which includes an opportunity to see your name and possibly your likeness in print!  I've priced the perks carefully and hope that you will consider backing this project.
You need my money for what now?

Producing an action figure is not an easy task, but I just know you'll love the results.  This is the second figure I have produced (the first being a Dr. Shroud figure) and understand what it takes to get it from concept to your hands.  I am working with an overseas company who has already produced this awesome sample:

Where will the money go?
To get more of these done, at least 500, complete with packaging, will cost around $6,500.  This includes the mold ($3,500), production, packaging and shipping and roughly takes about 6-8 weeks for full delivery. I figured that it's an all or nothing thing since we need to hit certain production minimums so if we don't hit the goal, we can just go our separate ways and call it quits.  Which would be awful!

I have some cool perks here---of course you can get the figure, or two or three.  BUT since Cyko KO is going strong on Alterna's newsprint line, there are Perks to get the comics, stickers, a SuperEarth Action certificate and even a shoutout or your a walk-on role in one of the upcoming books!  That's right, I'll put you in the crowd or even go so far as to work on a character for one of the future comics coming out this year or next, deadline dependent of course. Plus, I have some awesome stretch goals planned if we hit the mark, like variants, more articulation and even an alternate suit! Here's the packaging mockup (not the final design):

(above graphic is a mockup only and not final)
This is a chance to have a unique collectible!  Heck, even if you haven't read the books---and you should---I think Cyko KO as a figure, even to hold and cherish, is something worth working for! NOTE: Prototype does not show articulation in the knees, but final figure will have 7 points of articulation!
Perks
There are some really fun Perks here---stickers, an Action Club Membership and even a chance to be in the comic!  Here are some visuals to help you out:
SuperEarth Action Club Certificate (8" x 10")

Front

Back
Sticker (3" x 3")

Sticker sized 3" x 3"
Cyko KO Volume 1 (Issues 1-3)

Comics are signed by Rob Feldman
 
Risks & Challenges

As soon as we have the full funding, we can start production.  The company I am working with is highly reputable, having produced many of the figures you have seen on the shelves. It takes about 6-8 weeks for completion and once they are done and in my hands, you'll get them soon after!
But like any good project, you know that there could always be unforeseen issues, particularly with shipping across the world, so there is that. Barring a natural disaster, man-made disaster, sickness, or death (and even then I've provided instructions for its continuation) your product will be delivered.

Other Ways You Can Help
And if you don't have the cashola now, no sweat, I get it.  But maybe  you would consider sharing the campaign through social media or even sharing it with someone you think might like this? I'd super appreciate it! In any event, thanks for reading this far!

story:
INDIEGOGO DOESN'T HAVE REVIEWS SO WE'VE POSTED A FEW FROM OUR PREVIOUS CUSTOMERS. Link to more reviews from previous customers at the bottom :) 

 

Sad People Get Big Smiles!

OK GUYS! So the cards for the seniors are going to these cities... But in all honesty, if you have a city/town that you feel needs some smiles, making it happen is a lot easier than you’d think. 

 Delivery to the seniors is no extra cost to you.

 

Passion Behind the Product

If we simply focus our attentions, we’d notice seniors all around us. This time of the year can get hard for them. Some have lost loved ones already or some simply don’t have anyone to visit them. We at Thoughtfuls have recognized there is a need and have taken the initiative for everyone to make positive changes in sad places.

 

“Pick a problem, and do something about it. Because to a person that is hurting, something means the everything.”

                                                                        -Oprah Winfrey

 

It’s remarkable how many first responses are close to identical when first hearing about Thoughtfuls. It’s usually along the lines of: “ we all know the seniors are there and in need, but they’re so often misplaced in the background of everyday life.” People are caring by nature; we know hearts genuinely bleed for the elderly. That’s why we take pride when people show appreciation for providing a service that allows that need for love to be sent and received.

 

Flowers in a Greeting Card With the Perfect Smell.

As a professionally trained artist and designer, and also someone who has battled the depths of depression. I knew the cards had to be more than a card you pick up at the shop. For some of the people receiving them, this will be the first thing they've been sent in a very long time. So the card had to be so unexpectedly wonderful that I could guarantee, at the least, a smile. With gold leafed envelopes, laser cut frames, and real flower with such a perfect scent; I understand why we sold so many so quickly.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't see yourself contributing to our efforts but you DO feel you would clap for this campaign if it was presented to you in an auditorium. Please share this campaign with people you think would like it.

story:
We all have a word that strongly hits us. A dream, or even a vague imagination of what we truly want to become. 

My name is Nao, born and raised in Japan, currently working in Brooklyn, New York. 

I often talk to my friends, feeling that they have a strong urge to do something and to reach their dreams, but most of the time they are struggling to do so. I wanted to create an artwork for them to live their dreams and making them recognize that how strong they are. I simply use black ink, calligraphy pen and gold paint.

Now, I am creating this collection of "illustrated quote art". I want you to be part of this project, by sharing me your favorite quote and your story behind it. It can be your own words, or a quote from somebody. It all depends on your backstories and your experiences, your dreams. I will put together your favorite quote together with your experiences and goals, and by sharing it, people across the world can get inspired and motivated by your story!

If you are willing to be part of this project, please send me your personal/favorite quote, together with your related experience/goals to naoamot(at)gmail.com. Feel free to send me pictures or images that you want me to include. Or, I can just surprise you.

I will create an online collection with all your illustrated quote art included together with your name, which will be shared to everyone who will participate in this project.  By sharing this collection created by all of us, I hope that people can get inspired and motivated by our collaborated work.

story: NO LONGER ACCEPTING DONATIONS
story_txt: NO LONGER ACCEPTING DONATIONS

story:
The NQA is a gift for the extraordinary people in your life. With it, you let them know that when it matters, you'll be there, no matter what.

 

Are you the one to call if they're ever in trouble?

Make sure they know!

A favour, No Questions Asked - This token says I got your back more powerfully then 1000 words. It's a gesture of friendship that lasts through the ages. 

This way you can be sure that if they ever wake up naked in the park, you have the privilege of crying from laughter and offering them a ride.

Each NQA token is made by the state mint, the people that make things like the Iron Cross. They are engraved with a unique serial number and manually finished for a perfect look.

 

Are you the one to call when they need advice?

Make sure they remember!

It's difficult to ask for advice or help, no matter how great your friendship is. 

I'll be there, No Questions Asked - This token shows and reminds them that when they need someone to talk to or more, they can always rely on you. 

If you're still going to be there for them when you haven't spoken in years and their SO went to buy cigarettes and never returned, this is the token for you.

 

Polaris - It's more than that 

Make it personal!

 

Polaris includes:

  • 1 NQA token, engraved with your words (62 characters)
  • 1 Faux leather box, engraved with No Questions Asked
  • 1 Resin support

 

A surprise is the best way of bringing someone in the present moment.

The box is designed to spark curiosity and prepare the receiver for a special moment. This way you can be sure they'll be receptive to your message.

 

Exquisitely engraved with your words

 

Polaris has a special look for any feeling

 

Others have written

Polaris will bring out the poet in you, you will personally be assisted to write a great message and you can also get inspired by our list of examples.

 

A timeless memento

The NQA is made to stay on display.

The hand-crafted resin support transforms the NQA into a timeless reminder of the connection between the two of you. This way, every now and then they'll see the NQA and remember there's a person out there that they can count on.

 

How it works

  1. Purchase the perk with the token style you prefer
  2. You will receive an e-mail with our form
  3. Fill in your text (62 characters) or ask for help
  4. NQA on the way

 

Sirius - The NQA at full power

When there's a lot that needs to be said, Sirius is the way to go. With Sirius you can get even the most complex and personal message through.

 

Here's our movie, there's better movies out there, but this one's ours and it tells the story of what we think the ultimate NQA is and does.

 

Why we need it

There's an invisible wall between us, we lose ourselves in misunderstandings and meaningful moments are forgotten in the blink of an eye.

Sometimes you need to speak about life, friendship and love. These talks don't come by often, there's never time, there's never the right mood, you need that one more shot of something first...

The wall is a concept that encompasses all psychological phenomena which cause us to not talk or not listen, from the typical introvert awkwardness to listening filters and the upper limit problem. 

The wall is everywhere and it needs to go. Sirius is here to help you break the wall and to get your message through. 

 

Once the wall is broken, it stays broken

When assembled, the NQA becomes a timeless reminder of your victory at keeping your connection alive.

 

 

Take the element of surprise to a whole new level

Sirius has an additional element to sweep them off their feet.

On the back of the cover there's a hidden letter. The cover is designed so that when opened, the letter will not be seen. You have to tell them when to read it.

 

Express yourself freely

You can use the letter to write down everything you have to say in any language. If words are not enough, you can even use pictures. It's a great way to immortalise a valuable memory you share.

 

The hidden letter is the icing on the cake

You can tell your family what they mean to you.

You can tell someone who taught you a valuable lesson, just how much it mattered. 

You can even write your significant other how much and why you love them.

From experience, if your message comes from the heart, by the time they finish reading it, teary eyes begin to show.

By the end you'll look like these guys

 

How it works

  1. Purchase the perk with the token style you prefer
  2. You will receive an e-mail with our form
  3. Fill in your texts or ask for our help
  4. NQA on the way

 

Special features, only on Indiegogo

The NQA takes a little bravery, that's why our backers will receive several Exclusive Features.

 

You have help from our writers

Writing something from deep down is not always easy.

That's why we're offering to help you out. With our experience and your stories, we're going to make the most beautiful gift you've ever seen.

A great example of this is Peter:

He wanted to make an NQA for his friend, but had no idea where to start. All we had to do was ask for a couple of stories of the two of them.

His first memory was that his best friend used to tie his shoelaces, because he didn't know how to do it himself yet. His NQA became: "To a friendship tied with laces".

 

Wall-Breaker Status

The wall is not something most people acknowledge. From those that do, few have the courage to take it on.

That's why we're mapping it.

All our backers & their friends will be mentioned on our worldwide-wall.

Be the first to break the wall in your state.

The Perks

Quality

We care deeply about offering you a great product and a great experience. That's why we're very strict when it comes to quality.

 

Production

We have already tested our production capabilities and produced 25 NQAs for the people who couldn't wait.

We are prepared for scaling our production and delivering 50 Sirius and 400 Polaris before this Christmas. 

The way in which we can handle production depends on the result of our campaign.

 

Shipping

Delivery in the EU is free.

Delivery in the US is handled through fulfillment companies and all transport costs are covered within the perk price.

The NQA is available anywhere in the world, but additional taxes may apply depending on each country's rules and regulations.

 

FAQ

 

1. Do you offer bundles ?

Yes, if you would like more than one piece contact us at social@cymbiogen.com and we will create a perk just for you.

2. How will this benefit me ?

Ultimately, the quality of our relationships to others is one of the things that impacts our lives the most. The NQA is a psychological product rather than just an item. It won't save you any money, it won't save you any time, but it will change your life. It's beauty is that it allows you to make a beautiful gesture for somebody and helps you really connect. These occasions present themselves rarely nowadays.

3. What can you do with it ?

Make grown men and women cry, in the best way.

After the part where you offer it to someone, the NQA is made to be a beautiful addition to any home. This way every now and then they will see it and remember they have at least one great person in their lives. A small reminder that you are not alone through rough times is a very big deal.

4. Why are you doing this ?

We've been designing and building machines for a living for over 5 years. The NQA from our point of view is the best "change the world machine" we could think of. It may look like just a fun gift, but the truth is our world is made out of many people with many different relationships. The NQA is made to increase the quality of relationships, people that are more secure about their connections are stronger and more productive. In 10 years the NQA will change the world.

5. What materials is everything made of ?

The tokens are made of tombac (bronze), treated with silver and patina in different ways to obtain the 4 looks.

The special tokens are made of silver and gold.

The Polaris box is made of faux leather, we don't harm animals.

The Sirius box is made of linden wood, for each box we will plant a new tree

The token supports are made of flexible epoxy resin in our workshop

6. Are the colors as they appear in the campaign ?

All representations are highly accurate. In the case of the tokens, pictures don't do them complete justice, they look slightly different depending on how the light lands on them. You'll be pleasantly surprised. 

Sirius Silver is identical to Lyra, the only difference is that it's completely made of silver, not only treated on the surface.

Sirius Gold, none of these have been made yet, but we can assure you they will be spectacular.

7. What are the limitations of the engravings ?

Our engravings are top of the line, only a handful of companies have a laser precise enough to engrave our tokens. The wooden engravings are made on painted linden wood with 2 coats of lacquer. Once complete, the engravings are covered with acrylic paint to give them an awesome look. 

Tokens

Each token can be engraved with up to 62 characters, arranged over 3 rows. One of the most exotic tokens we've had was: "For the one who was between the footprints and the bull's tail"

Letter

The highest common character count is ~1000. A smaller text is also good, we will arrange it to look great. Slightly larger texts can also be used.

When making a beautiful text engraving, nice paragraphs are a big part of the deal, thus character or word counts, don't really say much. You have a  160 mm / 100 mm canvas to play with. 

A good approximation is writing 1 page in Google docs with a font of 20.

Don't forget, we help with both writing and drawing and will send you a rendering of how things will look.

When preparing a drawing, keep in mind that the NQA engraving is only colored with one color, thus any drawing needs to be transformed to monochrome before engraving. We will handle the editing, but you have to pick an image that is suitable, think of a black tattoo for example.

8. How do you support us in writing?

If you purchase any form of NQA we will send you a small list of questions that will help you think of something nice to write.

If you wish, we will take a look over your answers and come up with a few texts for you, we're quite good. If you wish we can even set a small call to sort it out.

9. What are the sizes and weights ?

Token:

Diameter 42mm

Thickness 4.2mm

Weight ~42g for the tombac version (the silver and gold versions are heavier)

Yes it's the answer to everything, and it's made that way on purpose.

Polaris:

Box: 80x80x25 mm

Sirius:

Sirius box: 180x120x60 mm

10. Where is everything manufactured ?

The NQA is made 100% in the EU, materials come from Italy and Romania. All engravings tokens and final assembly are done in Bucharest Romania (that's where we're from, we're also not vampires).

11. Why crowdfunding ?

As we mentioned before, we really want people anywhere in the world to have a chance to enjoy our invention and, you know, make the world a better place together. To launch something world-wide we need a minimum number of orders outside of the EU to allow for effective shipping. Crowdfunding is the best way for us to do this. 

12. What's the deal with the Cymbiogen NQA ?

The entire idea for the NQA project began from a contest we held with our friends for obtaining our company name, Cymbiogen. Whoever gives us a winning idea gets a favor, No Questions Asked, no expiration date. 

We figured it may be a fun thing to add for people who hope to see the NQA succeed. If you ever need our help, you'll have it, No Questions Asked, any time, any place. It's in our best interest to hold true to our word. We hope to have some interesting adventures with these in the future. 

13. When does shipping begin ?

If it looks like this campaign will be successful we will immediately begin production. This means we will be able to begin shipping the NQA ~ 1 week after the campaign ends.

We are very confident you will have yours before Christmas.

14. Taxes

Every country has different rules and regulations, so we can't specify these values for everyone. We can specify that

There are no additional taxes or costs in the EU.

In the US we have deals in place with fulfillment companies to remove any extra expenditure from our pioneers.

If you live somewhere else there may be other taxes involved.

15. Interested in a distribution partnership ?

By all means, we are very happy to get the NQA into as many hands as possible if you'd like to help, contact us.

16. How do we contact you ?

You can e-mail us at social@cymbiogen.com or 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheNQA/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/the_nqa

These occasions present themselves rarely nowadays.3. This way every now and then they will see it and remember they have at least one great person in their lives. A small reminder that you are not alone through rough times is a very big deal.4. Why are you doing this ?We've been designing and building machines for a living for over 5 years. The NQA from our point of view is the best "change the world machine" we could think of. It may look like just a fun gift, but the truth is our world is made out of many people with many different relationships. The NQA is made to increase the quality of relationships, people that are more secure about their connections are stronger and more productive. In 10 years the NQA will change the world.5. What materials is everything made of ?The tokens are made of tombac (bronze), treated with silver and patina in different ways to obtain the 4 looks.The special tokens are made of silver and gold.The Polaris box is made of faux leather, we don't harm animals.The Sirius box is made of linden wood, for each box we will plant a new treeThe token supports are made of flexible epoxy resin in our workshop6. Are the colors as they appear in the campaign ?All representations are highly accurate. In the case of the tokens, pictures don't do them complete justice, they look slightly different depending on how the light lands on them. You'll be pleasantly surprised. Sirius Silver is identical to Lyra, the only difference is that it's completely made of silver, not only treated on the surface.Sirius Gold, none of these have been made yet, but we can assure you they will be spectacular.7. What are the limitations of the engravings ?Our engravings are top of the line, only a handful of companies have a laser precise enough to engrave our tokens. The wooden engravings are made on painted linden wood with 2 coats of lacquer. Once complete, the engravings are covered with acrylic paint to give them an awesome look. TokensEach token can be engraved with up to 62 characters, arranged over 3 rows. One of the most exotic tokens we've had was: "For the one who was between the footprints and the bull's tail"LetterThe highest common character count is ~1000. A smaller text is also good, we will arrange it to look great. Slightly larger texts can also be used.When making a beautiful text engraving, nice paragraphs are a big part of the deal, thus character or word counts, don't really say much. You have a  160 mm / 100 mm canvas to play with. A good approximation is writing 1 page in Google docs with a font of 20.Don't forget, we help with both writing and drawing and will send you a rendering of how things will look.When preparing a drawing, keep in mind that the NQA engraving is only colored with one color, thus any drawing needs to be transformed to monochrome before engraving. We will handle the editing, but you have to pick an image that is suitable, think of a black tattoo for example.8. How do you support us in writing?If you purchase any form of NQA we will send you a small list of questions that will help you think of something nice to write.If you wish, we will take a look over your answers and come up with a few texts for you, we're quite good. If you wish we can even set a small call to sort it out.9. What are the sizes and weights ?Token:Diameter 42mmThickness 4.2mmWeight ~42g for the tombac version (the silver and gold versions are heavier)Yes it's the answer to everything, and it's made that way on purpose.Polaris:Box: 80x80x25 mmSirius:Sirius box: 180x120x60 mm10. Where is everything manufactured ?The NQA is made 100% in the EU, materials come from Italy and Romania. All engravings tokens and final assembly are done in Bucharest Romania (that's where we're from, we're also not vampires).11. Why crowdfunding ?As we mentioned before, we really want people anywhere in the world to have a chance to enjoy our invention and, you know, make the world a better place together. To launch something world-wide we need a minimum number of orders outside of the EU to allow for effective shipping. Crowdfunding is the best way for us to do this. 12. What's the deal with the Cymbiogen NQA ?The entire idea for the NQA project began from a contest we held with our friends for obtaining our company name, Cymbiogen. Whoever gives us a winning idea gets a favor, No Questions Asked, no expiration date. We figured it may be a fun thing to add for people who hope to see the NQA succeed. If you ever need our help, you'll have it, No Questions Asked, any time, any place. It's in our best interest to hold true to our word. We hope to have some interesting adventures with these in the future. 13. When does shipping begin ?If it looks like this campaign will be successful we will immediately begin production. This means we will be able to begin shipping the NQA ~ 1 week after the campaign ends.We are very confident you will have yours before Christmas.14. TaxesEvery country has different rules and regulations, so we can't specify these values for everyone. We can specify thatThere are no additional taxes or costs in the EU.In the US we have deals in place with fulfillment companies to remove any extra expenditure from our pioneers.If you live somewhere else there may be other taxes involved.15. Interested in a distribution partnership ?By all means, we are very happy to get the NQA into as many hands as possible if you'd like to help, contact us.16. How do we contact you ?You can e-mail us at social@cymbiogen.com or Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheNQA/Twitter: https://twitter.com/the_nqa

story:
Short Summary

Why in the world do artists have to wait till they are discovered by some art gallery or be appreciated for their talent by a few to be recognized?

The more, we researched we found that there were no platforms where interviews or documentaries on emerging artists could be found. Sure, when an artist had become “famous” or was “dead” then documentaries were made upon them, but the question was what can I do to make positive change, after all, is not art what makes this world a better place.

Having found no platform for documentaries on artists, I decided to create one. Portrait and -gram which means a way of doing something resulted in Portragram, a vessel/platform for portraits on artists.

What We Need & What You Get

As a film director, facing challenges was not new, having spent thousands of dollars to develop this project, I had no regrets, I was happy to start a project to give a voice to artists. But, I want to do more.

The goal of this project is to do at least one documentary a month. This would mean that every month, Portragram can feature one artist to tell their story and give a voice to the artist.

The Impact

THESE ARE FILMS FOR CHANGE. While these films are of artists, they are more than just documentaries; they are a chance for CHANGE where the artists can now have an opportunity to tell their stories, speak about their art. These films do more than explaining the artist’s point of view; they let artists be recognized for their talent and art instead of being at the mercy of art galleries. So far I've used all my saving to promote this project, now, I need your help to help artists by continuing these documentaries featuring one artist every month.

Challenges

This is a non-profit project. We give our time and use our limited equipment to make these short documentaries without expecting anything in return. But there are other costs like editing, light technician, colorist, sound mastering. We are asking you to help us with covering these costs.

WE ARE LOOKING TO RAISE 20K (that is one video a month for 6 months/6 artists). Eventually, we want to do one video a month for a year. This is the bare minimum amount needed to pay sound and light technician, film colorist, editor, and cover mastering the sound.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us by spreading the word about Portragram project to give artists a voice. By sharing on your social platforms you are helping to make it happen. 

If you know an artist you feel deserves a chance then suggest it to us. We will do our utmost to make his/her story be told.

story:
Short Summary

Jemima loses her parents to carbon monoxide poisoning from fossil generators in Ajegunle slums in Nigeria. She moves in with her uncle and aunt who are advocates of environmental sustainability. They enrol her into St Peter’s Primary School, Lekki. Jemima befriends Jasmine, who alongside, her class teacher, Elizabeth, introduces her to the junior Energy club. Jemima with the help of her relative and organizations, eventually build a wind turbine for her community who lacked electricity access for a century.  The governor is so impressed and gives both Jasmine and Jemima full scholarships to study to any length. Jemima grows up to work for the United Nations, creating localized change within communities through global cooperation.

 

 

WHY THIS BOOK?

A UNICEF survey of children aged nine to 18 in 14 countries showed that children are deeply concerned about global issues affecting their peers and them personally, including climate change. Children feel marginalized because their voices are not being heard, or that their opinions considered. There is a need for the government, development partners and civil societies, private sector, households, and academia to continue to invest in sustainable energy needs that put children first. We are exploring the use of knowledge transfer in partnership with several actors to help children, significantly the most vulnerable and disadvantaged, benefit from these investments, and have a voice within this process. Given the enormity of the climate challenge, it is surprising how limited coverage of our changing climate receives in current children's fiction. After all, children will be responsible for the future protection of our fragile planet. So their knowledge and engagement are critical. Children can better understand global issues, engage in critical inquiry about themselves globally, and combine narrative structure with information to take children beyond and expand their knowledge of difficult scientific concepts such as climate change. They can be inspired to make a difference in the real world, just like Greta Thunberg. We need children to care about  the planet and understand the givings if they are to tackle the climate challenge that lies ahead. Storytelling can raise awareness and inspire children and young adults to act and become the next generation of Earth warriors.

*******

This book is based on my childhood experiences , true life stories  and present challenges in Nigeria, Africa, by extension. So, it is not entirely fiction. The book has been extensively researched. The co-author, Tenn Zipa, has extensive experience in writing children's books. This book secondarily teaches gender equality,  and leadership attitudes which children need to understand during their formative years. 

Catch them young, they say. This is what we plan to do with the book.

Through literature, children can explore different perspectives and actions beyond what they know by living in the story world of characters for whom they care. Children can better understand global issues, engage in critical inquiry about themselves globally, and combine narrative structure with information to take children beyond and expand their knowledge of difficult scientific concepts such as climate change.

 

 

 

It is never too early to teach your children about developmental issues and how they can contribute to change. This book aims to turn such a scary subject into information that can inspire and steer children in a productive direction.  Stories develop children's literacy and help convey beliefs, attitudes, and social norms, which, in turn, shape children's perceptions of reality. They allow children to move from a position of powerlessness to a place of possibility.  Through literature, children can explore different perspectives and actions beyond what they know by living in the story world of characters for whom they care. We aim to make these children champions of clean energy and environmental sustainability. We need children to care about the planet if they are to tackle the climate challenge that lies ahead. Storytelling can raise awareness and inspire children and young adults to take action and become the next generation of Earth warriors.


Hence, the need to publish a book for children that can effectively teach children the effects of energy poverty, renewable energy and environmental sustainability in a bid to deliver and secure sustainability. 

 

Supporting this book and REES Africa

There is severe energy inequality even when it comes to electrification. Everyone deserves the energy trilemma for access to dignity and opportunity. These most vulnerable and marginalised set are basically in the middle of nowhere -widening the inequality creating energy apartheid- creating a two-tier energy system – energy abundance in the Global North  and tiny solar lamps or nothing for these vulnerable Global South. These people are left behind and forgotten in the race to fulfilling UNIVERSAL energy access by 2030. The Global South is not the culprit of climate change, but are the most vulnerable people facing climate change issues and are at more disadvantage if they keep destroying rural landscape by burning biomass. 

We are launching a new project tagged under the REES Africa tagged the ‘The SDG Literacy Drive' to launch the book and sensitize primary/junior secondary schools in the six  geopolitical zones across Nigeria on SDG 7 and SDG 13, donating at least 2000 copies to their libraries.  At the end of the sessions, the students will be able to assemble a solar lamp or upcycle plastics into creative art.  Kids will be provided with materials and in line with the exercises in the book, will be involved in  DIY projects that will be beneficial to their immediate environment. 

Other activities to be carried out include ;

  • Immediate Community Clean-ups and provision of waste bins
  • Tree planting

The project will kick off by 5th of June 2021 (World Environmental Day) - 20 November 2021 (World Children’s day)

**********

Printed on sustainably sourced paper

Estimated arrival : December,  2021

Signed by the co-authors with a special worthy-note from REES Africa.

******************
When you purchase your copy of JEMIMA & THE WIND TURBINE, you will be helping us reach our crowdfunding goal .

Our costs include: 

1. Printing! When we meet our goal , we'll be printing  2,000 copies to be distributed to the libraries of schools across Nigeria.

2. Purchase of DIY elements for the practical sessions during the SDGs education.

3. Book packaging and shipping

4. Payment for more illustration designs , editors and project manager.

5. Advertising and PR

6. Travel costs and overhead for volunteers handling the sensitization.

7. Tenable profit from the book  will go directly into funding the electrification of rural and marginalised communities in Nigeria. 

 

I hope you'll pre-order your copy of JEMIMA & THE WIND TURBINE, and share this campaign. In doing so, you will be helping us produce, print, and distribute this hardcover first edition to children that are first hand victims of energy and environmental issues but are ignorant of the definition. Let us help children have a voice in one of the greatest challenges of our time.

 

Thank you in advance!

Yours sincerely,

Yetunde Fadeyi.

story:
Summary

My name is Lupe Gallo, I'm an Argentinean born/Malaysian based visual artist-yet I believe I'm an earthling- that concentrates in the emotional side of life, I think love it not overrated and I believe in magic. And that's basically, what I portray in my work. :)

Why is this campaign important to me? Describing yourself is never easy. Figure exposing yourself in front of a large audience. Getting shy, hm? I feel this is the beginning of a new era for me and I want to be sure that I am not the only one enjoying the ride, but sharing to all those around (and beyond, thank you internet!) It is important because you will help me create the exact dream exhibition that lays on my mind.

Art is a beautiful shape of expression, allowing you to expand those voices and letting yourself be heard. As an artist and sponge that I believe I am, art not only helps the maker but most clearly the viewer as well. This is important because we are in an era of lacking expressiveness and I am a strong believer this exhibition will help erase repression and expand views beyond the imaginary.

Why 1500 USD? 
that would be the perfect amount to make this showcase happen. Yet all contributions, regardless if I reach the goal, the money raised will be used solely for the exhibition and its costs. Everything is a sum! Little by little that's how we can make things happen! :D

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Everything helps! Share the event with your friends! Help me raise some greens or/and expand my ideas for this exhibition to be!

And now I sing... Put the lime in the coconut! Kisses and hugs <3

Lupe

story:
The “Become the Protagonist in My Life” Campaign

Whether we look at others with our own eyes or through the lens of social media
We cannot help but compare our lives to theirs.
We get hurt, lower our self-esteem and life becomes increasingly difficult.

They’re
Better than me,
Richer than me,
Smarter than me,
More Powerful than me.

To that we say,
Give yourself the attention you give unto others and
Console yourself from any suffering you endure from comparing your life to theirs.


I am OK.
I am doing well enough.
I am thankful to myself.​

Happiness comes not from overcoming misfortunes but from social comparison.

“Life is the stage upon which you are the protagonist”
You will find that in my compositions, you will continue to be the protagonist.

#Mirror

I install mirrors in my works which makes the whole composition unique to the observer as they become the centre of it. Even when the observer stays the same, the artwork will look different over time as we inevitably age and experience life.

At no single moment in time will the artwork be alike another, and may only be considered complete with an observer at its heart.
It is not “I think, therefore I am” but “I see this work, therefore I am complete”.
Like a stage does not exist without its protagonist, there is no meaning to life without your existence. I hope to convey this message through the mirrors I incorporate in my works.

#Butterfly & Bamboo

We usually call a straightforward person ’upright’. However, a straightforward person is considered too stiff, too prim, too proper. On the other hand, someone who obsesses on what is beautiful is considered too dissolute, too lazy, too idle. These two things seem like two rabbits you lose if you chase both.

In my work, the butterflies symbolise ‘beauty’ and the bamboo represent ‘uprightness’. Through the harmonious way the butterflies flutter through the field of bamboo, I wanted to show that ‘beauty’ and ‘uprightness’ can also work together in people.

#Breaking the Frame

Breaking out of familiarity is difficult: waking up early, exercising an hour a day, eating less. Routines end up shaping us but imprisoning us from trying something new. I wanted to break out of my frame of habits, stubbornness and fixations. This is what my broken frames signify.

# Spreading the message

1. Protagonist’s Badge Black/ Yellow/ Pink (3.2cm)

2. Protagonist’s Hand-Mirror Black/ Pink (6.8cm)

 

3. Protagonist’s Calendar 2018 [15X23(h)cm]

A mini-portfolio calendar to enjoy the works of Tommy Seo.
The vertical design saves table-space and includes a functional mirror.
The perfect calendar for your office or study desk.

4. Protagonist’s Eco-bag

 

5. Protagonist’s Mirror Artwork

A broken frame is incorporated to convey the message: “Break the Frame”.
We are producing a special limited edition of original works for this project.
Nothing is printed but personally created by the artist so no two works are the same (therefore size, type and positioning of butterflies and bamboo will differ for every mirror).
There are 15 limited rewards per colour.

 

6. Protagonist’s Dressing Mirror

A small version of the mirror featured in the TV show “Beauty Battle Show”.
We are producing a special limited edition of original works for this project.
Nothing is printed but personally created by the artist so no two works are the same (therefore size, type and positioning of butterflies and bamboo will differ for every mirror).
There are 5 limited rewards per colour.

# The Messenger

Artisignner(Artist+Designer+Planner) Tommy Seo

Kingston University, London, UK
MA in Design: Product+Space​ (International Scholarship)

Hongik University, Seoul, Korea
MFA in Fine art, Wood working & Furniture design

(Currently) Corporate Culture Foundation: Business Planning​

Art & Design Career

2017. 10 Collaboration with “Beauty Battle Show Season 3” (Currently airing: FashionN)
2017. 08 K-Design Award: Winner
2017. 03 Installation of works in Seoul Arts Center
2016. 09-12 Collaboration with “Beauty Battle Show Season 2” (FashionN)
2015. 01 Installation or works in Royal National Theatre, UK
2011. 08 Second private exhibition (Visual Frame Story) at Gallery M
2011–13 ”Chunjae Education” high school art textbook entry
2010–13 “Kyohak” middle school art textbook entry 
2009. 08 First private exhibition (Beauty & Honesty) at Gallery M

Multiple participation in other art fairs, design fairs and group exhibitions


# The Art
Collaboration with TV show ”Beauty Battle Show” (FashionN)

Artist Tommy Seo’s works make the space they’re in very special.
I worked with him in the TV show “Beauty Battle Show”
and thanks to his works he made the show that much
more complete and that much more special.”
[PD Hyun-Ah Kim]

Installation in Royal National Theatre, UK

Lots of our actors have said  how beautiful Tommy’s mirrors and tables are.
Often things backstage, which are not seen by the audience, are plain and functional.
It’s lovely to have such attractive things to work alongside.’
[National Theatre Head of Stage Manager Eric Lumsden]

Tommy’s dressing mirrors are very beautiful
and I wish him every success.
[British actress Caroline Carver]

Photoshoot in bespoke tailors “Dege & Skinner” on Savile Row (briefly featured in the Kingsman movie series)

 

Installation in Seoul Arts Centre

“The dressing room is a communal space for and home to great performers of the arts and to have transformed what were just functional mirrors into a piece of art, fitting with the meaning of the room - I was very impressed by Tommy’s creativity”
[Seoul Arts Centre Manager Woo Je Yang]

Featured in middle school and high school art textbooks

 

#Line up

 

#Epilogue: 
Becoming the protagonist in my life

As I have been studying and creating art throughout my career, I have always focused on how my work should be portrayed to the public but never too much on what message I’d hope to convey. There have been instances where I would finish my work first before forcibly adding meaning to it. I placed my priorities on how I should create my next piece and failed to consider my identity as an artist, my beliefs and my values, as a basis of my work.

We have learned the importance of appearance as children and as we become adults, we teach this to our young. That is why we place our interests in what job we would like to have but not what kind of person we would like to be, suppressing our potential and adjusting our talents within the rigid framework others have placed us in.

Everyone has their own values. These values change depending on your environment, your skills, your interests and what you believe you can do. If these values are not suppressed, undercut and undermined by the existing bourgeoisie, the individual actions and choices that are made with these values can become something special. This is how new jobs are created.

My project starts here. I have seen the worst of what a materialistic life can lead to and the monsters it creates. So my project, “The Protagonist in My Life”, was born to encourage a more values-orientated life.I wanted to convey this message in the ways I know best to express myself, and break free of the usual framework of considering the specific styles and materials I’d use.

Do not forget, we are all the protagonists in our lives.
And I need you to be the protagonist in my work for it to be complete.
So come, be the protagonist as you become part of the art.

Thank you.

Tommy Seo
story_txt:
The “Become the Protagonist in My Life” CampaignWhether we look at others with our own eyes or through the lens of social mediaWe cannot help but compare our lives to theirs.We get hurt, lower our self-esteem and life becomes increasingly difficult.They’reBetter than me,Richer than me,Smarter than me,More Powerful than me.To that we say,Give yourself the attention you give unto others andConsole yourself from any suffering you endure from comparing your life to theirs.I am OK.I am doing well enough.I am thankful to myself.​Happiness comes not from overcoming misfortunes but from social comparison.“Life is the stage upon which you are the protagonist”You will find that in my compositions, you will continue to be the protagonist.#MirrorI install mirrors in my works which makes the whole composition unique to the observer as they become the centre of it. Even when the observer stays the same, the artwork will look different over time as we inevitably age and experience life.At no single moment in time will the artwork be alike another, and may only be considered complete with an observer at its heart.It is not “I think, therefore I am” but “I see this work, therefore I am complete”. Like a stage does not exist without its protagonist, there is no meaning to life without your existence. I hope to convey this message through the mirrors I incorporate in my works.#Butterfly & BambooWe usually call a straightforward person ’upright’. However, a straightforward person is considered too stiff, too prim, too proper. On the other hand, someone who obsesses on what is beautiful is considered too dissolute, too lazy, too idle. These two things seem like two rabbits you lose if you chase both.In my work, the butterflies symbolise ‘beauty’ and the bamboo represent ‘uprightness’. Through the harmonious way the butterflies flutter through the field of bamboo, I wanted to show that ‘beauty’ and ‘uprightness’ can also work together in people.#Breaking the Frame
Breaking out of familiarity is difficult: waking up early, exercising an hour a day, eating less. Routines end up shaping us but imprisoning us from trying something new. I wanted to break out of my frame of habits, stubbornness and fixations. This is what my broken frames signify.# Spreading the message1. Protagonist’s Badge Black/ Yellow/ Pink (3.2cm)2. Protagonist’s Hand-Mirror Black/ Pink (6.8cm)
 3. Protagonist’s Calendar 2018 [15X23(h)cm]
A mini-portfolio calendar to enjoy the works of Tommy Seo.The vertical design saves table-space and includes a functional mirror.The perfect calendar for your office or study desk.4. Protagonist’s Eco-bag
 5. Protagonist’s Mirror ArtworkA broken frame is incorporated to convey the message: “Break the Frame”.We are producing a special limited edition of original works for this project.Nothing is printed but personally created by the artist so no two works are the same (therefore size, type and positioning of butterflies and bamboo will differ for every mirror).There are 15 limited rewards per colour. 6. Protagonist’s Dressing MirrorA small version of the mirror featured in the TV show “Beauty Battle Show”.We are producing a special limited edition of original works for this project.Nothing is printed but personally created by the artist so no two works are the same (therefore size, type and positioning of butterflies and bamboo will differ for every mirror).There are 5 limited rewards per colour.# The MessengerArtisignner(Artist+Designer+Planner) Tommy Seo
Kingston University, London, UKMA in Design: Product+Space​ (International Scholarship)Hongik University, Seoul, KoreaMFA in Fine art, Wood working & Furniture design(Currently) Corporate Culture Foundation: Business Planning​Art & Design Career2017. 10 Collaboration with “Beauty Battle Show Season 3” (Currently airing: FashionN)2017. 08 K-Design Award: Winner2017. 03 Installation of works in Seoul Arts Center2016. 09-12 Collaboration with “Beauty Battle Show Season 2” (FashionN)2015. 01 Installation or works in Royal National Theatre, UK2011. 08 Second private exhibition (Visual Frame Story) at Gallery M2011–13 ”Chunjae Education” high school art textbook entry2010–13 “Kyohak” middle school art textbook entry 2009. 08 First private exhibition (Beauty & Honesty) at Gallery MMultiple participation in other art fairs, design fairs and group exhibitions
# The ArtCollaboration with TV show ”Beauty Battle Show” (FashionN)Artist Tommy Seo’s works make the space they’re in very special.I worked with him in the TV show “Beauty Battle Show”and thanks to his works he made the show that muchmore complete and that much more special.”[PD Hyun-Ah Kim]Installation in Royal National Theatre, UKLots of our actors have said  how beautiful Tommy’s mirrors and tables are.Often things backstage, which are not seen by the audience, are plain and functional.It’s lovely to have such attractive things to work alongside.’[National Theatre Head of Stage Manager Eric Lumsden]Tommy’s dressing mirrors are very beautifuland I wish him every success.[British actress Caroline Carver]Photoshoot in bespoke tailors “Dege & Skinner” on Savile Row (briefly featured in the Kingsman movie series) Installation in Seoul Arts Centre“The dressing room is a communal space for and home to great performers of the arts and to have transformed what were just functional mirrors into a piece of art, fitting with the meaning of the room - I was very impressed by Tommy’s creativity”[Seoul Arts Centre Manager Woo Je Yang]Featured in middle school and high school art textbooks #Line up #Epilogue: Becoming the protagonist in my lifeAs I have been studying and creating art throughout my career, I have always focused on how my work should be portrayed to the public but never too much on what message I’d hope to convey. That is why we place our interests in what job we would like to have but not what kind of person we would like to be, suppressing our potential and adjusting our talents within the rigid framework others have placed us in.Everyone has their own values. These values change depending on your environment, your skills, your interests and what you believe you can do. If these values are not suppressed, undercut and undermined by the existing bourgeoisie, the individual actions and choices that are made with these values can become something special. This is how new jobs are created.My project starts here. I have seen the worst of what a materialistic life can lead to and the monsters it creates. So my project, “The Protagonist in My Life”, was born to encourage a more values-orientated life.I wanted to convey this message in the ways I know best to express myself, and break free of the usual framework of considering the specific styles and materials I’d use.Do not forget, we are all the protagonists in our lives.And I need you to be the protagonist in my work for it to be complete.So come, be the protagonist as you become part of the art.Thank you.Tommy Seo

story:
Summery

The story of Glimmer Hope is the story of artworks which will start in refugee camps and end in the gallery. you can read the whole story from here:

About me

I am Raad a syrian artist, I live in Jordan as a refugee outside the refuge camps.

As an artist it is hard to going on, it is hard to keep creating art for many reasons 

and off course money is the main reason.

My dream is 

to reside  the Glimmer of Hope art exhibition.

this one of my artworks

Glimmer of Hope Idea

I thought it is a good idea to reside an art exhibition about syrian refugees in Jordan, to be like a messenger for their pains, worries, and sufferings.

and to bring a smile for their lips and hope for their hearts.

and because I want Glimmer of Hope to be closer to reality, and to share them creating of art process, so my Idea was to go and paint from inside their camps.

A journey to refugee camps in Jordan

I will packed my luggage, equipments, materials, and canvases, and leave to their camps, and live with them , I will paint and write their stories, and I will organize and lead art workshop with them, for adults and children, males and females.

the journey takes about two months, and it will be interesting in spite of suffering inside the camps.

I will be pleased sharing them art and smiles.

The show stage

After my return loaded of artworks which is done by me and them,

the exhibition processing will start, I will rent a gallery in the capital Amman for one week, I will get ready the invitations, flyers, posters and everything related to the exhibition.

I will frame the paintings to be ready for show.

even the written stories will be displayed

Glimmer of Hope will be different sense of the word.

it will be closer to the reality, mixed with refugees tears and smiles.

a messenger for their worries and sufferings, and it will be their voices.

Who will be invited

I will try to invite all refugees who share  the work on paintings, I will invite the backers of this project, humanitarian workers, artists, journalists and from all segments of society.

Why should you contribute for Glimmer of Hope

The Glimmer of Hope is about refugees and it transfers their sufferings, worries, pains for public.

It is my first art exhibition, when you contribute for this you help me  to keep going.

Everybody will get some beautiful things from this art exhibition me, you, and refugees.

Perks

All paintings we reward for contributors are original paintings and will be created inside the refuge camps.

Good quality t-shirts and mugs decorated with different paintings.

Any perk you choose will be shipped to your home.

Other ways to support Glimmer of Hope

If you can not contribute for this project you still able to help us by spread the word

through social media,

Tell possible contributors, your friends, relatives about us

You can wish a good luck for us.

Budget listing

Materials

 100 different size canvases about 1200

acrylic color                              200 USD

Brushes and other stuff         150 USD

transportation               225 USD

living expenses in refugee camps        500 USD

the exhibition expenses

artworks framing  about     1000 USD

gallery rent expenses            2300 USD

invitations, flyers, Posters expenses   500 USD

flowers for opening the exhibition  100 USD

the indiegogo fee                                     325

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Total                                                    6500

story:
The Final poster

It will be a giant QR code on a 24*36 inch poster. This means the QR code will be around 23 inches/60cmwide. It will be 37 by 37 blocks (called modules) this means +-16mm for each squared tiny QR Code that is embedded. 80% of the smartphones can scan/read a 15mm one. So most of the smartphones will work.

The Rewards / Perks

  • The poster. See on the right what perk suits you. Special shipping or more than 2 to ship? Email me. hi@themilliondollarposter.com
  • The PDF will only be the giant QR Code with the embedded tiny QR Codes. So it's a square without title or special data or info (*). It will be activated

  • Be in the poster with a QR Code. This means in the poster. You can provide your own if you want. I'll make it based on Black and White and as simple as possible using a URL shortener depending on the length of the URL. If text, the max characters is 120 (QR Code version 5, 37*37 modules) and if you really want more it could go to 150 characters (QR Code version 6, 41*41 modules). Each QR Code must not direct to anything offensive or illegal. Email if in doubt.

Submitting your URL/Text for your QR Code will happen during the last 2 weeks of the campaign and after. Email us after 20 September. We'll email you when the campaign end (successfully).

More QR Code will be made available during the campaign if the current QR Code PERKS are taken. The GOLD QR Code will arrive near the end of the campaign. The PLATINIUM after the campaign.

(*) Once you receive your poster, you will need to activate it. This means it might not work and you'll need to solve the first puzzle to make it work. (A kid 6 years old will find the solution.

The game, puzzles and mysteries.

Imagine a giant crossword. So you have to find words and you only have clues located in the poster or on the website at a module location. You know the exact amount of letters of each word. Some clues or hints are everywhere on my various websites, in the updates, on the social networks of TMDP...

The video below illustrates in brief the type of puzzles you have to find. Later I'll give more examples.

Fixed Funding

It's all or nothing. If the goal isn't reached. No poster will be made!

If 1 million cents are reached (aka $10.000) the poster will be printed!

The Updates

I will update you on the finish of the paper and printing method during the campaign.

I hope to make the funny enough and hide some stuff for you in it. What? Do you think the game hasn't started? There will be clues, JOKERS (see below), Easter Eggs, hints everywhere. In the campaign, on the websites, on other places of the internet, in the real world.

It's simple, the higher the success, the more fun it will be and the better the poster and the website... The whole experience of TMDP.

I'll also show you soon how hard or how far you will have to level up your brain to find solutions to the puzzles. I'll show you a previous conceptual art project.

In the Press

See all press related on the website here. Below a few important who understand the potential of the project.

The Stretch Goals

I'll update this section during the campaign and announce it in other updates.

SG 1: The Color poster. It's possible and I only need to calculate the extra cost of it to plan the level of this goal. Color means more fun in the puzzles, means selected QR Codes can be in one or more colors. In brief, the poster will look nicer to look at and easier to find QR Codes.

SG 2: I'd like to offer a new reward of a large poster in 1189*841 mm but still waiting for the cost of printing and shipping.

... Ideas of SG ? Suggest some!

...

SG ? Super gamification : More puzzles, better interactive website. An app?

SG Final : 1 million dollar TATTOO + Celebrate the biggest Belgian Crowdfunding campaign.

Want to help and get a JOKER ? Print this Ad!

Print this ad (WORD / PDF) and put it near the coffee machine, on your car or private place, share a photo on TMDP facebook or TMDP on twitter (use #TMDP).

Conditions

  • Photo must contains at least 6 people + poster to be seen. (Don't Cheat!)
  • Don't forget to email it to hi@themilliondollarposter.com
  • And of course post it on FB or twitter.
JOKER?  The game will be made of several words to be found in a serie of several words. To WIN the serie, you must have ALL words correct. A JOKER will replace any error by the correct answer.
Short URL / Link to this campaign: http://igg.me/at/tmdp
Funds

  • I'm not a designer. I need to hire someone who can do the final poster in Indesign/Photoshop. I'll supply this person with the data and together we can make the poster look nice and fun

  • Shipping, VAT cost a lot, I have invested in 2 new printers & tools to test the concept and make the video.

  • I need to pay my time studying crowdfunding and preparing this campaign for weeks 17h per day. I've got no job for 14 months and I really need one so a little extra will help to pay bills. I do not plan to make a living or create a company for this project in case a large success. If so, I'd be happy to sell the copyright.

My biggest wish

It would be cool to have a very succesful project, that means : the campaign, the happy backers and receiving emails with smiles or frustrated people who are stuck with a puzzle/enigma.

I want the whole game to be rather difficult than too easy. I better add clues and hints to help from time to time.

And reaching 1 million USD (not much in my pocket really) would made history as the largest Belgian crowdfunding campaign. But YOU having fun with the poster is the main concern. Thanks again.

Risk and Challenges

I have made research to print and ship form the USA and depending on the amount of EU supporters/backers to print also in Europe. I have received from other campaign poster creators their poster and package supplier contacts and pricing.

Hopefully I'll find several printing companies and find the ones I can trust and that provide quality. I will update during the campaign on the printing quality and paper quality. Feel free to suggest me SERIOUS companies USA/Europe. Thanks.

The design of the poster. I made print in colors, different levels of grey (see gallery) and I'm confident in Black and White and even colors it will work. More testing will be done during the campaign.

Well I plan to visit the USA in November so that should help to ship from there if needed. 

In Belgium, I can drive in a few hours to the UK, France, NL and DE. It should reduce a bit the cost but it depends on how many backers. I'm not gonna move for 3 posters :)

If mega success. Well I can surely ask for help during the campaign to plan it. In Belgium my family has a warehouse big enough to store the content of a container. I have an army of friends and well; creating jobs would be cool too.

What about the App to Scan QR Codes? I spent an entire week learning everything I could about QR codes. I can even decode by hand but it's too slow. Machines are made for this.

I will make sure that every QR code can be scanned by 3-4 different phones and different apps.

The success to scan a QR code depends on 3 things:

  • size of the QR code ==> get closer / perhaps use a smartphone with a focus function in the camera
  • Resolution of the camera. I managed to scan a 21*21 module QR code printed on 4 mm*'mm size. Potentially a record. Please have a rather recent smartphone with a 2-5 megapixel camera. Without autofocus, it might not work.
  • complexity of the QR code. They are complex but tested.

Delivery on time ?

I'll work on the poster during the campaign as well. With a freelance designer in Indesign/photoshop. I master Paint / IrfanView and Excel but I need help on this and a second brain for ideas is welcome.

I hope to deliver by mid or end November and complete in December before the snow and Christmas. You want to have it asap and I want you to have it to have fun.

Backer satisfaction? That's my aim. Why ? I have many other ideas to be crowdfunded from film about my expeditions to a playing card game to create a website for an ecological charity action. You, my supporters are the first to be involved with it so I better make you happy and gain 100% trust and satisfaction. And yes the haters gonna hate.

Bear with me, be patient and polite.

FAQ

  • THE website of TMDP is bought for 10 years. I'm not responsible for any "attack" and loss of availability on the website hoster or website domain company.

QR Code is a registered trademark of DENSO WAVE.

PS: Why Indiegogo. I had my draft of campaign last week on Kickstarter but realized I could only raise in EURO and the Million EURO Poster as name would suck.

THE website of TMDP is bought for 10 years. I'm not responsible for any "attack" and loss of availability on the website hoster or website domain company.
QR Code is a registered trademark of DENSO WAVE.
PS: Why Indiegogo. I had my draft of campaign last week on Kickstarter but realized I could only raise in EURO and the Million EURO Poster as name would suck.

story:
The Global Day of Giving kicks off a season of togetherness and giving, this is why we are launching our campaign on this particular period. We invite you to support our Art 4 Human Rights seasonal campaign through donations and a with shared hope for new beginnings.

ART can only flourish in an atmosphere of freedom from fear, violence and repression. Democratic societies based on HUMAN RIGHTS provide the best institutional framework in which arts can thrive and artists are protected against repression and persecution.

At the same time, the universal language of the arts, which attracts and empowers human beings around the globe more than any other means of communication, is the most powerful and joyful medium to promote the universal values of human rights. Yet, human rights and democracy are under stress.

A new year and a new season is approaching in quite difficult times due to the COVID-19 emergency and where online activities are essential to remain united. By supporting our crowdfunding campaign, you will help us organise the Global Campus of Human Rights #Art4HumanRights seasonal online activities for 2021 and give the opportunity of expression to artists/activists and the members of our vast academic network.

 

Help us to raise the voices of our community of art creators:

"For me, it is very important that art enters reality, physically. When I create a drawing, and afterwards I see someone holding it in their hands and I realise that that drawing is linked to them… only then I have achieved my goal. To see my illustrations at manifestations, or being used by activists everywhere in the world, this means that my art is right. It goes beyond the artistic sphere, entering people’s everyday life, a kind of art which makes them think and act".

Gianluca Costantini, Italian artist and activist

ABOUT US:

The Global Campus of Human Rights is a unique network of one hundred universities around the world. Its mission is to advance human rights and democracy education through regional and global cooperation.

We share with many organisations the willingness to support the implementation of the 2030 UN Agenda, including Sustainable Development Goal 4 which aims to “ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all”.

For more information about our activities visit gchumanrights.org of follow us on social media!

story:
What is Lunar Rainbow About?

Lunar Rainbow tells the story of when Princess Luna from the impoverished Kingdom of Darkness is arranged to marry Prince Rainbow from the prosperous Rainbow Kingdom. The newlyweds clash immediately but must work together to fight nefarious forces threatening to destroy their kingdoms. Will they be able to save their Kingdoms or are their differences too great to overcome?

This ongoing fantasy adventure comic is inspired by the individuality, hard work and strength inspired by the struggles that many people of color face.  

You can learn more:

 Facebook Page:  https://www.facebook.com/Swaybaebrand

Webtoon: https://www.webtoons.com/en/challenge/lunar-rai... 

Main Characters

Prince Rainbow is the carefree, genuine prince of the Rainbow Kingdom. He is fun-loving, smart, handsome, and he knows it. His life is turned upside down when he gets married to Luna. 

 

Princess Luna is the strong and passionate princess of the Kingdom of Darkness. She cares immensely about the people in her Kingdom and her sworn mission is to help them thrive. 

 

Who created Lunar Rainbow?

I am Consuela Hendricks- artist, community organizer, and the creator of Lunar Rainbow. Lunar Rainbow is the first comic/webtoon that I have ever brought to fruition. I made Lunar Rainbow so there would be more comic book protagonists who look like me going on adventures and doing everyday things. I have struggled with seeing people of color not existing in fairy tales and/or serving as minor characters to an overall white narrative. Lunar Rinabow is a way for me to subtly and explicitly explore my identity and to write about cute romances and adventures, with each character being based off someone in my life. 

 

Cost and Budget

My budget is $7,000. If I do not reach my goal I will still put as much money as I can to my artist as well as the production of my hard cover copies of Lunar Rainbow.

Artist Cost: $2,000 dollars to complete the enter Lunar Rainbow Series

15 Second Animated Trailer: 1,000 dollars 

100 Lunar Rainbow Hard Copies Cost: $1,500 - $2,000

Sample Merchandise Cost: $30-50 dollars per item sample

 

Perks

Disclaimer: Merchandise will change over time due to updates. So merch will not always be as seen.

Impact

I hope that this art brings people joy and it support fun. I also hope people of color feel represented and engaged while reading it.

 

Risks & Challenges

As this is my first webtoon and indiegogo, it is always a risk whether I can get enough funding. If I can’t reach my funding goals, I plan to apply for grants. I am a skilled grant writer in my day job so this can reduce risk for supporters. 

One risk is that the printed edition will not look like how you expect. To alleviate that I will post updates about how the books look like via Instagram, Facebook, and Indiegogo.

Another risk is that the products may be damaged through shipping. I will pack everything to reduce this risk as much as possible. If anything is damaged through shipping, I will try my best to support while also making sure I have enough funds to make Lunar Rainbow a reality.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please Share, Follow, and support while also making noise on Indiegogo.

story:
What We Need & What You Get

  • IMVERSE has some amazing tech that can take 360 photos and programmatically turn them into a true to scale 3D model. The rough preview is what you can see in the campaign video. From there the team goes in to break out all of the objects individually, clean up textures, and make sure that the assets will render properly in WebGL, Unity, Blender, Etc.
  • The cost of this service is $1050, which is beyond the MeshyFlesh means. Hence a crowdsourced campaign to see if we can preserve this legendary spot in the forever of cyberspace. 
  • We were blown away by the difference between visiting Room 201 in the IMVERSE demo vs 360 photos in VR. Even in it's rough state, the IMVERSE demo gave us flashbacks to be there doing the initial captures. Being able to visit Room 201 in VR is something we want to share with you, and our $20 perk is a lot less expensive than a ticket to Japan (assuming you are outside of Japan).
  • Developers of Virtual Reality and Video Games can spring for access to the high quality assets which are tested for compatibility across the common softwares. Animators and enthusiasts will be able to load the models in Sketch Up, Meshlab, or Blender and go to town. Surveying existing asset stores, the $50 mark is fair for a unique room full of objects, all textured and ready to drop into your environment of choice. 

Risks & Challenges

  • There's really no risk here, if we make the goal then IMVERSE will perform the service they have demonstrated around the world. Check the quality of their work on twitter, vimeo, and facebook.
  • Additional funding on top of the $1050 (please let us have this problem) be used to capture more, different l̶o̶v̶e̶ fashion hotel rooms. We have 360 photographers on the ground in Japan with knowledge of the most unique spots to ensure any follow up captures will not disappoint. 

IMVERSE? MeshyFlesh?

  • IMVERSE is democratizing virtual and mixed reality content creation. The company is a spin-off from EPFL developing software and providing services for photorealistic Mixed Reality content creation. Their volumetric solutions reduce the time and money spent on pre-production phases of Virtual Realty marketing experiences and Hollywood movies by a factor of 10. This is only possible thanks to our proprietary rendering and simulation engine and our easy and fast process to transform a single 360-degree 2D picture, from any commercial camera, into a 3D VR/MR room-scale experience with live hologram actors and real-time VFX.
  • MeshyFlesh is a yung smol company exploring possibilities in VR without fear of taboo. We're woke to the issues that sexual images in mass media create, but believe exploration of personal fantasies is creative and self-fulfilling. This is one of our first experiments but have lots in store if we find the support (Hiiiii angels!)

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share the video, formatted for social and free to download!
  • Share this campaign link especially with all your freaky friends!
