story:
ENGLISH

BIO

Experimenter, self taught working on a wide range between visual and audio visual arts. Through personal experiences, modern art styles, psychology and conceptual art inspirations. Sometimes he blends thoughts and make art pieces that coexist inside occult, symbolism and modern ways like an imaginary neo-shamanism of now. In most of the work there is a secret need of introspection and the mediums vary through photography and digital hybrids. There is no such importance in the medium but in the new persona that is being born through imagination. Anything that could feed the spirit .

Characteristics of the book :

This is the first experimental silent comic book that came after synthesizing the experiences of 3 years. It consists of 28 pages of four sections. Is collated, the pages contained 25 color digital illustrations into four sections and an experimental poem divided into four parts at the end of each module.

Ιnfluences :

Does democracy really exists as a concept ?

 When is the time for ideological systems to be degraded and to be changed , and when is the time to be destroyed. Do they really become shadows of their own ‘’self’’, covering the ideas and the people their were born from ? ,and then manage to control their subconscious .

 A system (such as democracy) ends up to be coercive but not been questioned , this kind of compulsion contaminates the -possibly- healthy evolution of ((civilization)) and ((culture )).

It becomes a virus

Every concept such as ‘speech’ and ‘logic’ are under a disease if there not ‘moving’

 reconstruction and degradation are processes of analyzing a language or a conceptual and ideological system. In order to present ,in common view, all the non-operational or internal and hidden contradictions  that nourish and poison its original purpose, So that it can be reborn , and serve its primary and original purposes , ,plus the needs of the new age .

 

What  & What

My raised funding ,is made to cover all the typography costs, advertising  and creative needs of the whole process ,also to give me more time to start my next project .

The first edition of the book will be 90 copies of the book ,all signed by me. You ll receive a copy of the book and many more according to your funding rate. 

There are special gifts  such as collective artprints  of the book, carpostals edition and an exclusive  Special edition with a full package. Some of you will be able to win special gifts made for this campaign.  

This is one of the first experimental poetry comic books ever made.  

It was also , introduced in an art festival in Greece.

Support my effort because united we stay  and we have to communicate through art and words !

For those who can not contribute and want to support anyway , they can use the power of social media and share this story of mine ! 

Thank you all ! Make art ! Share art ! Keep art alive ! Keep optimism alive !

 

ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ 

ΒΙΟ

Πειραματιστής, αυτοδίδακτος στο ευρύτερο εικαστικό και οπτικό – ακουστικό κομμάτι των τεχνών και του σύγχρονου με επιρροές από προσωπικά βιώματα, την ψυχολογία και την εννοιολογική τέχνη. Αναμιγνύει σκέψεις και μέσα από αυτές χτίζονται συνθέσεις που ακροβατούν ανάμεσα στο απόκρυφο, στις σύγχρονες έννοιες ενός φανταστικού νεο-σαμανισμού, των λέξεων και της στιγμής. Με έναν άτυπο άξονα την ανάγκη της ενδοσκόπησης, τα μέσα που χρησιμοποιεί ποικίλουν, άλλες φορές η φωτογραφία κυριαρχεί, άλλες πάλι δημιουργεί υβρίδια έκφρασης με διάφορα μέσα και υλικά, ώστε να κυριαρχεί η ελευθερία της έκφρασης μέσα στο σύνολο ολιστικά.

Δεν έχει σημασία το μέσο. Αλλά αυτός ο άλλος εαυτός που γεννιέται μέσα από τη φαντασία. Καθετί που δίνει τροφή στο πνεύμα.

 

Χαρακτηριστικά του βιβλίου:

Aυτό είναι το πρώτο πειραματικό silent poetry comic book που ήρθε μετά την σύνθεση των βιωμάτων 3 ετών . Αποτελείται απο περίπου 28 σελίδες  και απο4  ενότητες. Είναι σελιδοποιημένο, στις σελίδες του εμπεριέχονται 25 έγχρωμες ψηφιακές εικονογραφήσεις  σε τέσσερις ενότητες και ένα πειραματικό ποιήμα που χωρίζεται σε 4 μέρη στο τέλος κάθε ενότητας .

Χρησιμοποιώ εννοιολογικά την τέχνη της τυπογραφίας, της εικονογράφησης και της βιβλιοδεσίας μιας και ανήκουν στα πιο δημοφιλή Μ.Μ.Ε ώστε να γίνει ξεκάθαρη η ¨ παράξενη ¨ δημοσιότητα που έχει αποκτήσει τα τελευταία χρόνια η έννοια της δημοκρατίας , τα έντονα χρώματα, τα μάτια και το pop ύφος ώστε να φανεί η σχέση που έχει αποκτήσει η δημοκρατία με την ποπ κουλτούρα (social media, pop καλλιτέχνες ). Το βιβλίο έχει την λογική του cut book ,δηλαδή σε όλες τις σελίδες του υπάρχει ένδειξη διακεκομένων γραμμών για ελεύθερο κόψιμο για να τονιστεί η ανάγκη για αναδόμηση  και αποδόμηση.

Επιρροές και στοιχεία :

Τι  είναι η δημοκρατία αλήθεια, τώρα που οι εποχές αλλάζουν και οι έννοιες αρχίζουν να μοιάζουν παλιές και εκτός τόπου και χρόνου. Μέσα απο τις σελίδες του ο δημιουργός άρχισε να νιώθει την ανάγκη να εξερευνήσει με μια ποπ αισθητική το τώρα της ζωής όπως φιλτράρεται μέσα απο την κοινωνία στην οποία το βιώνει. Λειτουργώντας κυρίως με το υποσυνέιδητο παρατηρούμε σχόλια επάνω στηνπροσωπική  ελευθερία, την ενσυναίσθηση, την μετανάστευση και την πολιτική συγκυρία των καιρών.

Έρχεται ο καιρός όπου τα ιδεολογικά συστήματα (δημοκρατια,θρησκεια,κρατη,συνορα,πολιτισμοι) φθάνουν σε μια σταθερη και πάγια κατάσταση όσο ο χρόνος περνά, τότε παίρνουν μορφή στο υποσεινήδητο όλων και γίνονται σαν φαντασιακά όνειρα που μας οδηγούν στα τυφλά .

Γίνονται σκιές που δεν βλέπουμε, γίνονται χέρια που μας καθοδηγούν σε σκοτεινές εποχές και η αναγκαιότητα τους πλέον είναι αναποφευκτα συνδεδεμένη με την μορφή μας και την σκέψη μας.

Πόσο σημαντική λοιπόν είναι η αναθεώρηση των συστημάτων αυτών όταν παίρνουν μια τέτοια μορφή, είτε πρόκειται για θρησκείες, είτε για πολιτικά, πολιτιστικά,επιστημονικά συστήματα. Πότε αυτά παύουν να εξυπηρετούν την εξέλιξη και αποκτούν καθαρά καταναγκαστικό χαρακτήρα εις βάρος όλον των ανθρώπων που επιρρεάζουν άμμεσα αλλα και έμμεσα?  

Όταν ένα τετοιο σύστημα (όπως η δημοκρατία) καταλήγει να έχει καταναγκαστικό χαρακτήρα και δεν εξετάζεται ή αναθεωρείται , αυτό το είδος του καταναγκασμού κάνει μεγάλο κακο στην όποια - πιθανή-  υγειή εξέλιξη των πολιτισμών .

Όπως ο λόγος και η λογική έτσι και όλες αυτές οι ιδεες και έννοιες νοσούν όταν δεν κινούνται. 

Τα ιδεολογικα συστηματα ειναι προιοντα της ανθρωπινης λογικης και του ανθρωπινουν λογου και έχουν την αναγκη να αναδομουνται και να εξελισονται αναλογικα με ότι τα δημιουργεί. 

Η αναδόμηση και η αποδόμηση είναι διαδικασίες ανάλυσης ενός γλωσσικού, εννοιολογικού ή ιδεολογικού συστήματος. Με σκοπό να εκθέσει  σε κοινή θέα όλες τις μη λειτουργικές ή εσωτερικές και κρυφές αντιφάσεις του, που τρέφουν και δηλητηριάζουν τον αρχικό σκοπό του, ώστε να γεννηθεί εκ νέου, εξυπηρετώντας τους σκοπούς που ορίστηκαν εξ αρχής.

Τι και τι  ?
Η  χρηματοδότησή μου καλύπτει όλο το κόστος τυπογραφίας, τη διαφήμιση και τις δημιουργικές ανάγκες ολόκληρης της διαδικασίας, επίσης μου δίνει περισσότερο χρόνο για να ξεκινήσω το επόμενο καλλιτεχνικό έργο μου.

Η πρώτη έκδοση του βιβλίου θα είναι 90 αντίγραφα του βιβλίου, όλα υπογεγραμμένα . Θα λάβετε ένα αντίγραφο του βιβλίου και πολλά άλλα ανάλογα με το ποσο χρηματοδότησής σας.

Υπάρχουν ειδικά δώρα, όπως συλλεκτικά artprints, carpostals και μια αποκλειστική ειδική έκδοση με πλήρες πακέτο.  Μερικοί από εσάς θα μπορέσετε να κερδίσετε ειδικά δώρα που γίνονται για αυτή την εκστρατεία.

Αυτό είναι ένα από τα πρώτα πειραματικά ποίηματα κόμικς που έγιναν ποτέ.

Επίσης, στην Ελλάδα παρουσιάστηκε σto φεστιβάλ τέχνης RE CULTURE #4 , σε συλλογική έκθεση στην Πάτρα. 

 

Για εκείνους που δεν μπορούν να συνεισφέρουν και θέλουν να υποστηρίξουν ούτως ή άλλως, μπορούν να χρησιμοποιήσουν τη δύναμη των κοινωνικών μέσων και να μοιραστούν αυτή την ιστορία μου!

Eυχαριστώ θερμά όλες και όλους  σας!  Κάντε τέχνη!  Μοιραστείτε τέχνη!

Κρατήστε την τέχνη ζωντανή! Κρατήστε την αισιοδοξία ζωντανή!

It becomes a virus
Every concept such as ‘speech’ and ‘logic’ are under a disease if there not ‘moving’
 reconstruction and degradation are processes of analyzing a language or a conceptual and ideological system. In order to present ,in common view, all the non-operational or internal and hidden contradictions  that nourish and poison its original purpose, So that it can be reborn , and serve its primary and original purposes , ,plus the needs of the new age .
 

What  & What
My raised funding ,is made to cover all the typography costs, advertising  and creative needs of the whole process ,also to give me more time to start my next project .
The first edition of the book will be 90 copies of the book ,all signed by me. You ll receive a copy of the book and many more according to your funding rate. 
There are special gifts  such as collective artprints  of the book, carpostals edition and an exclusive  Special edition with a full package. Some of you will be able to win special gifts made for this campaign.  

This is one of the first experimental poetry comic books ever made.  
It was also , introduced in an art festival in Greece.
Support my effort because united we stay  and we have to communicate through art and words !
For those who can not contribute and want to support anyway , they can use the power of social media and share this story of mine ! 
Thank you all ! Make art ! Share art ! Keep art alive ! Keep optimism alive !
 
ΕΛΛΗΝΙΚΑ 
ΒΙΟ
Πειραματιστής, αυτοδίδακτος στο ευρύτερο εικαστικό και οπτικό – ακουστικό κομμάτι των τεχνών και του σύγχρονου με επιρροές από προσωπικά βιώματα, την ψυχολογία και την εννοιολογική τέχνη. Αναμιγνύει σκέψεις και μέσα από αυτές χτίζονται συνθέσεις που ακροβατούν ανάμεσα στο απόκρυφο, στις σύγχρονες έννοιες ενός φανταστικού νεο-σαμανισμού, των λέξεων και της στιγμής. Με έναν άτυπο άξονα την ανάγκη της ενδοσκόπησης, τα μέσα που χρησιμοποιεί ποικίλουν, άλλες φορές η φωτογραφία κυριαρχεί, άλλες πάλι δημιουργεί υβρίδια έκφρασης με διάφορα μέσα και υλικά, ώστε να κυριαρχεί η ελευθερία της έκφρασης μέσα στο σύνολο ολιστικά.
Δεν έχει σημασία το μέσο. Αλλά αυτός ο άλλος εαυτός που γεννιέται μέσα από τη φαντασία. Καθετί που δίνει τροφή στο πνεύμα.
 
Χαρακτηριστικά του βιβλίου:
Aυτό είναι το πρώτο πειραματικό silent poetry comic book που ήρθε μετά την σύνθεση των βιωμάτων 3 ετών . Αποτελείται απο περίπου 28 σελίδες  και απο4  ενότητες. Είναι σελιδοποιημένο, στις σελίδες του εμπεριέχονται 25 έγχρωμες ψηφιακές εικονογραφήσεις  σε τέσσερις ενότητες και ένα πειραματικό ποιήμα που χωρίζεται σε 4 μέρη στο τέλος κάθε ενότητας .
Χρησιμοποιώ εννοιολογικά την τέχνη της τυπογραφίας, της εικονογράφησης και της βιβλιοδεσίας μιας και ανήκουν στα πιο δημοφιλή Μ.Μ.Ε ώστε να γίνει ξεκάθαρη η ¨ παράξενη ¨ δημοσιότητα που έχει αποκτήσει τα τελευταία χρόνια η έννοια της δημοκρατίας , τα έντονα χρώματα, τα μάτια και το pop ύφος ώστε να φανεί η σχέση που έχει αποκτήσει η δημοκρατία με την ποπ κουλτούρα (social media, pop καλλιτέχνες ). Το βιβλίο έχει την λογική του cut book ,δηλαδή σε όλες τις σελίδες του υπάρχει ένδειξη διακεκομένων γραμμών για ελεύθερο κόψιμο για να τονιστεί η ανάγκη για αναδόμηση  και αποδόμηση.
Επιρροές και στοιχεία :
Τι  είναι η δημοκρατία αλήθεια, τώρα που οι εποχές αλλάζουν και οι έννοιες αρχίζουν να μοιάζουν παλιές και εκτός τόπου και χρόνου. Μέσα απο τις σελίδες του ο δημιουργός άρχισε να νιώθει την ανάγκη να εξερευνήσει με μια ποπ αισθητική το τώρα της ζωής όπως φιλτράρεται μέσα απο την κοινωνία στην οποία το βιώνει. Λειτουργώντας κυρίως με το υποσυνέιδητο παρατηρούμε σχόλια επάνω στηνπροσωπική  ελευθερία, την ενσυναίσθηση, την μετανάστευση και την πολιτική συγκυρία των καιρών.
Έρχεται ο καιρός όπου τα ιδεολογικά συστήματα (δημοκρατια,θρησκεια,κρατη,συνορα,πολιτισμοι) φθάνουν σε μια σταθερη και πάγια κατάσταση όσο ο χρόνος περνά, τότε παίρνουν μορφή στο υποσεινήδητο όλων και γίνονται σαν φαντασιακά όνειρα που μας οδηγούν στα τυφλά .
Γίνονται σκιές που δεν βλέπουμε, γίνονται χέρια που μας καθοδηγούν σε σκοτεινές εποχές και η αναγκαιότητα τους πλέον είναι αναποφευκτα συνδεδεμένη με την μορφή μας και την σκέψη μας.
Πόσο σημαντική λοιπόν είναι η αναθεώρηση των συστημάτων αυτών όταν παίρνουν μια τέτοια μορφή, είτε πρόκειται για θρησκείες, είτε για πολιτικά, πολιτιστικά,επιστημονικά συστήματα. Πότε αυτά παύουν να εξυπηρετούν την εξέλιξη και αποκτούν καθαρά καταναγκαστικό χαρακτήρα εις βάρος όλον των ανθρώπων που επιρρεάζουν άμμεσα αλλα και έμμεσα?  
Όταν ένα τετοιο σύστημα (όπως η δημοκρατία) καταλήγει να έχει καταναγκαστικό χαρακτήρα και δεν εξετάζεται ή αναθεωρείται , αυτό το είδος του καταναγκασμού κάνει μεγάλο κακο στην όποια - πιθανή-  υγειή εξέλιξη των πολιτισμών .
Όπως ο λόγος και η λογική έτσι και όλες αυτές οι ιδεες και έννοιες νοσούν όταν δεν κινούνται. 
Τα ιδεολογικα συστηματα ειναι προιοντα της ανθρωπινης λογικης και του ανθρωπινουν λογου και έχουν την αναγκη να αναδομουνται και να εξελισονται αναλογικα με ότι τα δημιουργεί. 
Η αναδόμηση και η αποδόμηση είναι διαδικασίες ανάλυσης ενός γλωσσικού, εννοιολογικού ή ιδεολογικού συστήματος. Με σκοπό να εκθέσει  σε κοινή θέα όλες τις μη λειτουργικές ή εσωτερικές και κρυφές αντιφάσεις του, που τρέφουν και δηλητηριάζουν τον αρχικό σκοπό του, ώστε να γεννηθεί εκ νέου, εξυπηρετώντας τους σκοπούς που ορίστηκαν εξ αρχής.
Τι και τι  ?Η  χρηματοδότησή μου καλύπτει όλο το κόστος τυπογραφίας, τη διαφήμιση και τις δημιουργικές ανάγκες ολόκληρης της διαδικασίας, επίσης μου δίνει περισσότερο χρόνο για να ξεκινήσω το επόμενο καλλιτεχνικό έργο μου.
Η πρώτη έκδοση του βιβλίου θα είναι 90 αντίγραφα του βιβλίου, όλα υπογεγραμμένα . Θα λάβετε ένα αντίγραφο του βιβλίου και πολλά άλλα ανάλογα με το ποσο χρηματοδότησής σας.
Υπάρχουν ειδικά δώρα, όπως συλλεκτικά artprints, carpostals και μια αποκλειστική ειδική έκδοση με πλήρες πακέτο.  Μερικοί από εσάς θα μπορέσετε να κερδίσετε ειδικά δώρα που γίνονται για αυτή την εκστρατεία.
Αυτό είναι ένα από τα πρώτα πειραματικά ποίηματα κόμικς που έγιναν ποτέ.
Επίσης, στην Ελλάδα παρουσιάστηκε σto φεστιβάλ τέχνης RE CULTURE #4 , σε συλλογική έκθεση στην Πάτρα. 
 
Για εκείνους που δεν μπορούν να συνεισφέρουν και θέλουν να υποστηρίξουν ούτως ή άλλως, μπορούν να χρησιμοποιήσουν τη δύναμη των κοινωνικών μέσων και να μοιραστούν αυτή την ιστορία μου!
Eυχαριστώ θερμά όλες και όλους  σας!  Κάντε τέχνη!  Μοιραστείτε τέχνη!
Κρατήστε την τέχνη ζωντανή! Κρατήστε την αισιοδοξία ζωντανή!

story:
Introducing: Howard, the pteranodon

We are product design engineers who, since childhood, have been crazy about dinosaurs! Even to this day, we have kept our most cherished dinosaur toys.

After launching our T-rex model a few years ago, we have learned that people really appreciate QUALITY and ACCURACY when it comes to replicas. When designing our pteranodon, wanted to create a model that incorporates the following features:

  1. Large size for a more authentic experience
  2. The option of secure suspension from the ceiling (clutter-free)
  3. Easy assembly
  4. Clean look that goes with any decor
  5. Better price point than our competitors

Thanks to valuable feedback from our previous backers, we have made a model that is sure to please and we are THRILLED to share it with you. We hope you'll love it as much as we do!

 

 

Our Mission

Quite often, fossil models are inaccessible to the average consumer. Our goal is to create unique, QUALITY dinosaur replicas at affordable prices, so anyone can bring the museum home. We truly admire these creatures and want to offer others who share this passion a product that they will love.

Thanks to the valuable feedback from our supporters and facebook community, we are thrilled to offer this piece that is so true to our hearts. 

 

The problem we are solving

We realized how expensive realistic dinosaur replicas can be; ranging from $200 for a small sized unit, to a whopping $1000 or more!

We wanted to make a model that would LOOK GREAT in ANY ROOM; something someone could display with pride.  

 

Most dinosaur models available are basically toys.

There are a lot of dinosaur skeleton models out there; however most are toys. With cheap finishes and low quality plastic, they come NOWHERE CLOSE to resembling fossils at the museum. 

 

 

Existing models can be very expensive...

How you can help us offer the best products

We need to raise funds to be able to produce our pteranodon replica at a more affordable price.

We are a small company, so by raising between $5,000 and $10,000, we will have access to industrial SLA 3D PRINTERS that will produce our model in the same high-grade plastic, but at a lower cost.

If we raise above $10,000, we will be able to afford OUR OWN MOULDS! This will open us up to using a wider range of MATERIALS; from white, black and transparent plastics, to different rubbers and even metals (such as pewter.)

HOW YOU CAN HELP US make this a reality:

1. Become a campaign backer!

2.Share our link on social media

 

How Howard came to be

Howard was designed over many design--> 3D print---> test iterations to become what he is today. He was hand sculpted in 3D using Z-brush. Below is our very first iteration:

After getting feedback from some of our awesome followers, we cleaned up the model and changed it's orientation an open-wing position, giving it impressive size and the option to attach to a base or the ceiling.

Check out this 3D model with a VR on your phone!

By raising between $5,000 and $10,000, we will have access to industrial SLA 3D PRINTERS that will make producing our model much more affordable!

 

*There is a link with a discounted price HIDDEN somewhere in the campaign*

 

Our PERKS

 

$0 share to get your FREE 3D dinosaur file

  • Share the link above/ below and get a FREE 3D printable 
  • A new 3D printable jurassic model will be given away every week

story:
A platform formed around a community of creatives and servers of Christ around the globe, in the media creation department, connecting them on a single platform

The platform is formed on 3 stages

1. Community

People are getting invited, from different cities around the globe. A community forms. People engage in developing ideas, sharing them, and searching for help in their projects.

2. Client

We release the client platform, where people can create an account as an individual, or as a church/organisation, and search to hire people on contract or on project. They can search for a person on a specific domain, in a specific city, and we give them options.

3. Worldwide

We want to think the platform free, open source, and expandable. Our first market to hit up is Romania and USA. After that, we are gonna look forward for feedback from different countries that would like a platform like this. As a suggestion we have Hungary, Ukraine, Austria, and Germany, as the first countries to develop our technology into after we launch, in Europe.

story:
WELCOME.

Hi Earthlings and beyond! I am Lexc Bowling, an Interior Designer working to receive my Masters in Architecture, currently residing in Lexington, Kentucky. I have a passion for art, people, places, things, and our future. Most of my work and dedicated research revolves around creating a socially sustainable world with high focus on our existence amongst ourselves, the natural world, and this emergence with the digital world. As I implement these practices into all of my design work, I have been hard at work developing an art installation that encompasses all of this... step inside react.

THE VISION.

PROJECT SUMMARY: react. pods are experimental environments whereby users enter a portal to radical self-expression. Powered by the user’s physical and emotional energy the participant is immersed in vibrant hues and is encouraged to explore authentic movement as expression and expression as art. 

INTERACTIVITY: react. exists by embracing 5 key elements: light, color, sound, media, and movement. The interaction between individual and installation helps explore and illustrate the alchemy of the user’s physical and emotional energy. Inside, the participant will augment their environment by selecting vibrant hues that mimic the mood they feel in the moment. Influenced by curated sounds, the door to explorative movement is opened. The visuals projected onto the focus wall will morph with the changing rhythms of bodies and sound melting into a kaleidoscope of expression. In react., one can move, meditate, create, and explore the landscapes of their mind. Disappear in dance and liberate the senses, flowing in and out of the beat as body and mind transcends. react. embodies what it is to burn by creating space for an individual to freely express and explore their truest self. This portal will transport and translate a genuinely interactive playa experience to virtually anyone, anywhere in the world.

PHILOSOPHY: The magic of movement is brewed in all its unexplainable, impossible, and synchronistic experiences. Of these moments that I’ve been fortunate enough to engage in, my backwards stumble into an ecstatic dance circle prevails. We exist in a time of fast pace and instant messages. Natural and truly therapeutic processes occur all around us, yet we are distracted. It is as if we have therapy constantly at our fingertips, but have lost touch with how to harness it. Our bodies have devolved into a shape for holding devices and our eyes are fixed on the screen. We are numb to curiosity, our attention is divided, and connection to the world in which we float has been disturbed. react. seeks to revive ancient therapeutic practices of light, color, sound, and movement, and seed them with technology so they may flourish in the now. react. will reshape our bodies and lift the stigma drowning out our existence in the digital-age to provide an individualized yet integrated space for healing.

PHYSICAL DESCRIPTION: Inspired by kaleidoscopic elements, each react. pod is designed as a 6-sided polygon with a ceiling and floor defining sacred space for individual participant experience. The frame is constructed of modular steel framing. The focus wall is a blank wooden panel situated adjacent to a short-throw projector. Surrounding walls encase panels of LED light arrangements varying in color, adjusted by each individual. Approaching the nest of pods, illuminated exteriors invite curious onlookers to explore the space and their own inner selves. Birthed by the union of LED light and motion-capturing media, the interior environment morphs into a vibrant haven where every movement mimics a brushstroke, creating a visual reflection of the participant's energy. 

VIEW MORE AT: www.technolexically.com/react

THE OBSTACLES.

As a student, with all of that economic gloom, I am face-to-face with funding challenges. BUT, when money is the only problem, is it really a problem? I believe with manifestation, devotion, and passion, this vision will find a way to come to life... starting here, in this campaign. I am seeking to grow this project with merely my own hands. The more I can grow support and awareness, the further this vision travels. Ideally, transportation will support the journey home and evolve2 will radiate with inspiration from said travel, while bringing art back to Kentucky. 

My passion and drive helps me when facing the obstacles. I will not give up and work to produce this vision into something impactful and special to each individual that interacts with it. With this, we gain power!

YOUR SUPPORT WILL GIVE LIFE TO REACT.

The total budget per react. pod is around $4,800. 

Most of the budget here goes towards the flexible aluminum framing. This aspect of the piece is elegant in design, durable, and truly honors the 'pop up' experience react. offers. The idea is that react. will morph into many different interactive environments throughout its lifespan. Within the boundaries of the framing, unlimited possibilities await. By loading this environment with tools for creativity, pod construct will offer space for creatives of all kind and thrive on collaboration through its many forms. 

react. is in the running for partial grants of all sorts at events and festivals around the country. While we eagerly wait for responses, it is crucial to begin bringing this project to life. To build react. we depend on FUNDRAISING EFFORTS AND DONATIONS OF GENEROUS SUPPORTERS AND COMMUNITY.

Funds raised will go to all aspects of the project.  From materials to transportation, each donation will help in the process of bringing react. to a space near you!

It is with full intention that react. explore our local community and provide a haven for expression outside of its typical environment. This ritualistic environment hopes to touch familiars and strangers alike, unifying us all on a path to deeper self discovery!

DONATE TODAY!

Donations of $4 or more will receive a react. sticker.

Donations of $50 or more will receive their choice of:

*a pair of react. symbol earrings (wooden or acrylic)

or 

*a react. symbol necklace. (wooden or acrylic)

OTHER WAYS TO SUPPORT.

Your help means the world to this vision. Every dollar counts and goes toward this campaign. Other ways to get involved include:

*MAKING SOME NOISE about the vision. Share it via social media with friends, family, and strangers.. Help to spread the word!

*Also, connect with me personally as we seek to manifest the ethics of Burning Man into our everyday community and life! LET'S COLLABORATE.

And that's all there is to it. **Drops mic**

The idea is that react. will morph into many different interactive environments throughout its lifespan. Within the boundaries of the framing, unlimited possibilities await. By loading this environment with tools for creativity, pod construct will offer space for creatives of all kind and thrive on collaboration through its many forms. 
react. is in the running for partial grants of all sorts at events and festivals around the country. While we eagerly wait for responses, it is crucial to begin bringing this project to life. To build react. we depend on FUNDRAISING EFFORTS AND DONATIONS OF GENEROUS SUPPORTERS AND COMMUNITY.
Funds raised will go to all aspects of the project.  From materials to transportation, each donation will help in the process of bringing react. to a space near you!
It is with full intention that react. explore our local community and provide a haven for expression outside of its typical environment. This ritualistic environment hopes to touch familiars and strangers alike, unifying us all on a path to deeper self discovery!
DONATE TODAY!
Donations of $4 or more will receive a react. sticker.
Donations of $50 or more will receive their choice of:
*a pair of react. symbol earrings (wooden or acrylic)
or 
*a react. symbol necklace. (wooden or acrylic)

OTHER WAYS TO SUPPORT.
Your help means the world to this vision. Every dollar counts and goes toward this campaign. Other ways to get involved include:
*MAKING SOME NOISE about the vision. Share it via social media with friends, family, and strangers.. Help to spread the word!
*Also, connect with me personally as we seek to manifest the ethics of Burning Man into our everyday community and life! LET'S COLLABORATE.
And that's all there is to it. **Drops mic**

story:
About Us

We are group of friends from Prague, Czech Republic who would like to bring our projects to the 2015 Burning Man: Carnival of Mirrors festival in the Nevada desert. Each of us represent a different art field. Bamboo Element creates interactive installations out of bamboo including musical instruments, vehicles, as well as large constructions in nature. Emerging young artist Jakub Nepraš, who has exhibited all over the world, combines in his work two media - sculpture and video to create a unique artistic language. Third of our group is gorgeous, magical, and breathtaking Linda Mikolášková - stage makeup artist and cofounder of Amanitas Fire Theater. We are a happy members of our Clusterf*ck United camp and all our artwork and workshops will be located there. All the events will be listed in Burning Man Events program.

From Prague to Burning Man FACEBOOK PAGE

Bambufonomat by Bamboo Element


The Bamboo Element crew present an interactive musical instrument for four players where each plays a unique and important role in the final musical output. It’s a combination of music and visuals connecting four people through interaction with each other.

http://bambooelement.cz/

Jakub Nepraš

Jakub will bring his unique art - video paintings on plexiglass from his Culture series. Jakub draws upon scientific and philosophical knowledge, as well as personal experience, emotions and intuition. He studies the contemporary developmental tendencies and behaviour of our super-organism in relation to the position of the individual within the whole entity, and to monitor those natural principles that control or influence all of this. Jakub is reflecting the fundamental changes of society and technology and the dangers and estrangement from human beings and nature. He aims in his work to re-appropriate a more original and more pure way of life and to give natural, organic forms to contemporary society and technology.

http://jakubnepras.com/


Amanitas


The Amanitas Fire Theatre was founded by Tereza Georgievová and Linda Mikolášková and the group has acted on the Czech new circus scene since 2010. Linda will organize stage makeup workshop in our camp and do some performances as well.

http://www.amanitas.cz/about-us

http://lindamikolaskova.com/en/make-up

Screenprinting

We have years of experience with screen printing - a manual technology for printing on both textile and paper. We will bring many different screens with our designs to print on your t-shirts in our camp.


What We Need & What You Get

We need your help and support to transport our artwork to be displayed in the Nevada desert in the 2015 Burning Man: Carnival of Mirrors festival.

We are extremely thankful for any support. We are not able to realize this project and bring our art across the world to Burning Man without your help. Fly tickets and Burning Man tickets are not part of the budget. 

All the funds will be used for:

    10% - Fees

    • Indiegogo fees

    • Paypal fees, exchange rate

    30% - Rewards

    • Creation

    • Postage

    30% - Transportation

    • Package transported by airplane: Prague -> San Francisco

    • Trailer rent for transportation San Francisco -> Black Rock City -> San Francisco

    • Package transported by airplane: San Francisco -> Prague

    30% - Workshops, technical equipment, etc.

    • Improvements of Bambufonomat to survive desert conditions and provide new experience

    • Fuel for generator (7days)

    • Screenprinting workshop - preparation of screens, paint, …

    • Stage makeup workshop props

    • Projector protectors for dust environment or old projectors

    • Other technical equipment

Rewards

From Prague to Burning man digital print, format: A2 (16.5 x 23.6 inch), limited edition 50 pc.                                              Value 75 USD hires preview

Bambufonomat t-shirts. Hand printed 3-color t-shirts that we are going to print in our workshop. We use high quality colors and heavy  t-shirts.                                                                                                                Value 40 USD

Jakub Nepras - Cultures - Sprout, 2007. Digital print, deluxe paper (Hahnemuhle Photorag 188gm2), hi-res render, format: A2 (16.5 x 23.6 inch), limited edition 50 pc signed by the artist.                   Value 170 USD                                                                                                                    hires preview

Amanitas mask. Custom made mask for a backer. We will contact you and discuss mask design with you. Mask displayed at picture are just for illustration. Our designer will show you more designs. Limited edition 2 pc.                                                                               Value 440 USD

Bambufonomat hand made print that we are going to print in our workshop. We use high quality colors and high weight paper. Limited edition 50 pc signed by the artist.                                      Value 75 USD

Bambufonomat CD. We are going to record music liveset you create with our musical instrument Bambufonomat at Burning Man. Limited edition 50 pc.                                                                           value 35 USD 
Bambufonomat CD + meeting with us +  your record included as bonustrack. We will personally teach you how to get the best from Bambufonomat. Limited edition 3.                                 Value 500 USD

Amanitas digital print, format: A2 (16.5 x 23.6 inch), limited edition 50 pc, format: A1 (23.6 x 33 inch), limited edition 20 pc.                         photos by Anna Šolcová.                                                 Value 75 /150 USD                                                                                                                   hires preview

Thank you postcard with one of our past projects signed by the team.
                                                                                                               Value 12 USD

Screen-printed geometrical ornamental scarf ( 40x40 inch) for the desert dust.                                                                                 Value 28 USD

    Burning Man

    Burning Man is an art festival located in Nevada desert built on principles of self-relience and radical self-expression (http://survival.burningman.com/culture/the-10-p...). We have already been there and this time we want to bring our art to share it with others.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Even if you can't contribute to our financial goal, that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • Visit us at the 2015 Burning Man event at out Clusterf*ck United theme camp.
    • Attend any of our events and workshops.
    • Help us get the word out about our art and our goal.
    • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

I'm a writer, painter, and educator living in Grand Rapids, MI. For a little while now, I've been working on a series of paintings that highlight the uniqueness and beauty of birds that we often take for granted: sparrows, robins, bluebirds, seagulls, etc. Since I don't have a lot of connections in the art scene locally, I want to produce some prints to get my work out there and use the sale of the prints as a jumping off point for more paintings. 

What We Need & What You Get

The company with whom I'm contracting has quoted me the following prices:

  • $45 per image to scan, edit, and color correct. Once they have the images, the pictures can be printed on demand. This is the biggest expense. I would like to have six of my paintings on file, at least initially. This is a total of $270, plus taxes.
  • $7.50 per print. I would like to produce 10 prints of each image to have on hand for stock and sale. This is a total of $375.
  • The additional money (~$350) will go to producing the "rewards" for backers and purchasing materials for more paintings. 

Risks & Challenges

I don't anticipate any particular challenges or risks in this project. The prices quoted will remain constant, and as long as I reach at least the $600 level, I will have enough stock on hand to, hopefully, continue the funding process on my own.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign on social media! I'm just starting out on my art career, and I'm not even sure many of my friends know what I've been up to.

story:
Short Summary 

Hi! I’m Phoenix Carpenter, 2019 Skills USA Welding Sculpture National  Runner-up, and Founder and creator of Phoenix Metal Art. Born and raised in the hills West Virginia, I operate out of my home studio to spread my art work to these hills and hopefully the world. Any contributions will go towards supplies and well needed equipment for here in the shop. I am still in need of various machines such as; a Plasma Cutter, horizontal band saw, oxy-fuel tanks and torches, a tig welder, and many more necessary items that will expand my art capabilities.

What We Need & What You Get

Metal is considered to be one of the most difficult mediums to work with, to make the process easier and more efficient, I am looking to expand my home studio with various equipment and machines. Such as a Plasma cutter and consumables, a multi-process High frequency TIG welder, and horizontal band saw. I am looking for a goal of $1000, with that I will be able to produce more and higher quality art, and distribute to more customers. Even if my goal is not reached any and all contributions will be greatly appreciated and will go towards one thing or another to expand my shop. 
 

There will be different levels of contributions with various levels of perks or rewards. Everything from Eternal Gratitude, signed original prints, raffles for higher end art,  discounts and credit towards custom orders, and even your own piece of unique art from Phoenix Metal Art!  

The Impact

The impact of this fundraiser will greatly improve my welding and art limits, and I will get more of my art around the world! In making all of this “Scrap Metal Art” I am recycling junk and metal materials, that most people would think is trash, in my own unique way that takes ugly junk that would otherwise take up space in landfills. 

Risks & Challenges

Welding and metal sculpting can be rather dangerous with possibility of electrocution, fires,  burns, eye damage, lung damage, cuts, and even several cancers. By making things more efficient and quicker, thats less time working with these conditions that are inevitable.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that times are difficult right now during this Covid-19 pandemic, if you are unable to contribute towards this cause, please share this link and make some noise for an inspiring local artist.

story:
Disappearance enables everyone to rediscover the classic paintings of the past. 

Re-imagined masterpieces from the most beloved artists of all time offered as Giclée Fine Art Prints and Art Posters for you to collect and enjoy.

Welcome to Disappearance | New Art from the Old Masters.

 

 

With respect and skill we recreate classic paintings with a modern touch. 

Dawn | Maxfield Parrish | Giclée Fine Art Print

 

A graceful renewal of a painting by American neoclassicist Maxfield Parrish.

Like a theatre stage, the formal presentation of this painting beckons you in. The colors delight us with their luminous hues. 

Taste the sweetness of the early morning air... and have this wonderous view all to yourself.

"Dawn" is certain to brighten your day.

 

 

Winter | Pieter Bruegel | Giclée Fine Art Print

 

A winter’s day...silence, icy mountains, frozen lakes. Time standing still.

An inspired work of a master Artist, the exceptional print quality of "Winter" astounds with all the hidden details of Bruegel’s vision.

 

Closed | Edward Hopper | Giclée Fine Art Print

 

Painting as Film Noir.

A downtown diner late at night…  We stare uninvited through the large plate glass window. We pause and reflect on the emptiness of modern life. Dense shadows of the dark and deserted urban streetscape surround us.

Cue: muted saxophone and footsteps receding out of sight in the distance, the film set is "Closed" now.

 

 

Monday Morning | Georges Seurat | Giclée Fine Art Print

 

For Parisians, Sunday is the day to escape the heat of the city and head for the shade of the trees. What you often find are hordes of your fellow citizens with the exact same plan!

Peace. Solitude. Nature. Sunday crowds, or the quiet of "Monday Morning".

Which do you prefer?

 

Hahnemühle German Etching Paper | Giclée Fine Art Print

 

Our Giclée Fine Art Prints are simply the finest prints available. They are expertly printed on Hahnemühle German Etching paper with archival inks.

This heavyweight paper (310gsm) is velvety smooth with a fine surface texture. Premium mould-made and with a distinct pattern, German Etching preserves the feeling of genuine art.

Four deckle edges complete each print, providing a classic touch.

Giclée Fine Art Prints are available in four sizes.

--

Giclée Fine Art Print | Easel | 18" x 12" | 42cm x 30cm  

Giclée Fine Art Print | Studio | 24" x 16" | 60cm x 42cm

Giclée Fine Art Print | Gallery |  34" x 24" | 84cm x 60cm   

Giclée Fine Art Print | Museum | 48" x 34" | 119cm x 84cm

--

Note: The sizes above are approximate - they vary slightly with the dimensional integrity of the individual artworks.

 

Crossing the Bridge | Edvard Munch | Giclée Fine Art Print

 

An empty bridge… a walk at sunset... when suddenly the setting sun turns the clouds "a blood red" as if an "infinite scream passing through nature” has occurred.

It has been said: “Could only have been painted by a madman”. 

At some time in our lives, when we scream silently in despair, are we not "Crossing the Bridge"?

 

 

The Boat | John Waterhouse | Giclée Fine Art Print

 

Legends tell that a beautiful woman lived alone in a tower on an island by this river. One day she glimpsed in her cursed mirror the reflected image of the fair knight Lancelot and chanced to gaze at him directly. The mirror cracked and a spell fell upon her. She drifted in her boat downstream ‘singing her last song’ and died before she reached Camelot and her love.

"The Boat" is indeed a beautiful and haunting work of Art.

 

The Sea of Fog | Caspar Friedrich | Giclée Fine Art Print

 

A rocky precipice boldly rises above a landscape covered in a thick sea of fog. 

Considered one of the founders of Classical Romanticism, Friedrich said : "The artist should paint not only what he has in front of him but also what he sees inside himself.”

Experiencing "The Sea of Fog", should we not feel the same?

 

The Long Table | Leonardo da Vinci | Giclée Fine Art Print

 

Leonardo painted this masterpiece on the wall of the dining room in the refectory of the Dominican convent of Santa Maria delle Grazie.

Done in tempera and oil on gypsum, instead of the standard fresco technique commonly used in this era, the painting moves us with its magnificence.

A superior Giclee Fine Art Print, as close to the original as possible... which begs the question: exactly what happened at "The Long Table"?

 

 

 

 

 

An Indiegogo World Premiere ~ Introducing new Art Posters!

Featuring a bold and modern look, they offer Disappearance quality at a great price.

 

Dawn | Maxfield Parrish | Art Poster

 

Art Posters are available in four sizes.

--

Art Poster | Small | 16" x 12" | 40cm x 30cm

Art Poster | Medium | 28" x 20" | 70cm x 50cm

Art Poster | Large | 36" x 24" | 91cm x 61cm

Art Poster | Giant | 40" x 28" | 100cm x 70cm

--

 

This Disappearance Indiegogo campaign of two weeks duration is planned so that you will receive your Giclée Fine Art Prints and Art Posters six to eight weeks after the end of the campaign.

The Sea of Fog | Caspar Friedrich | Art Poster

 

These premium quality Art Posters are printed on archival acid-free 190gsm paper.

 

The Hill | Andrew Wyeth | Art Poster

 

 

Below are the nine Art Posters available in your choice of four sizes.

 

 

 

The Art Poster print quality is superb, looking great with and without frames.

Below is a comparison showing the differences between our Giclée Fine Art Prints and the new Art Posters.

 

 

 

Here is chart depicting the relative sizes of our Giclée Fine Art Prints and Art Posters.

 

 

Giclée Fine Art Prints and Art Posters are shipped carefully rolled in sturdy premium tubes. All shipments include worldwide tracking.

 

 

 

Dent-de-Lion du Midi is Master Artist at Teeth of the Lion studios in Bern, Switzerland.

A lifelong artist, his extensive portfolio includes works of literature, orchestral music, film, illustration and sculpture. A classicist with a modern eye, his work explores the philosophical dichotomy between realism and myth.

As a professional inventor, Dent-de-Lion holds numerous patents and was Director of Digital Research for LEGO, trailblazing projects in VR, digital toys and feature film.

For all enquiries, please contact his personal assistant Monika Iris Young: monika@teethofthelion.com

 

 

Thank you for your visit.

Disappearance is based on classic paintings by John Waterhouse, Maxfield Parrish, Pieter Bruegel, Edward Hopper, Georges Seurat, Edvard Munch, Andrew Wyeth, Caspar Friedrich, and Leonardo da Vinci. New works will include paintings by Vincent van Gogh, Pablo Picasso, Sandro Botticelli, David Hockney and many others. 

Much love to our friends and family, to our patrons, sponsors and benefactors, and to our colleagues at Indiegogo, Apple, Hasselblad, Procreate, Backerkit, and Skriba who have helped us so much. 

The music in the project video is a public domain recording of a great favorite.

Music | Pictures at an Exhibition

Composer | Modest Mussorgsky, orchestrated by Maurice Ravel 

Performer | Minneapolis Symphony Orchestra

Conductor | Antal Dorati 

The solo piano in the museum video is performed by A. Ghindin.

-

Thank you dear backers for your support for our work, it's sincerely appreciated!

Roar!
story_txt:
Disappearance enables everyone to rediscover the classic paintings of the past. Re-imagined masterpieces from the most beloved artists of all time offered as Giclée Fine Art Prints and Art Posters for you to collect and enjoy.Welcome to Disappearance | New Art from the Old Masters.  With respect and skill we recreate classic paintings with a modern touch. Dawn | Maxfield Parrish | Giclée Fine Art Print A graceful renewal of a painting by American neoclassicist Maxfield Parrish.Like a theatre stage, the formal presentation of this painting beckons you in. The colors delight us with their luminous hues. Taste the sweetness of the early morning air... and have this wonderous view all to yourself."Dawn" is certain to brighten your day.  Winter | Pieter Bruegel | Giclée Fine Art Print A winter’s day...silence, icy mountains, frozen lakes. Time standing still.An inspired work of a master Artist, the exceptional print quality of "Winter" astounds with all the hidden details of Bruegel’s vision. Closed | Edward Hopper | Giclée Fine Art Print Painting as Film Noir.A downtown diner late at night…  We stare uninvited through the large plate glass window. We pause and reflect on the emptiness of modern life. Dense shadows of the dark and deserted urban streetscape surround us.Cue: muted saxophone and footsteps receding out of sight in the distance, the film set is "Closed" now.  Monday Morning | Georges Seurat | Giclée Fine Art Print For Parisians, Sunday is the day to escape the heat of the city and head for the shade of the trees. What you often find are hordes of your fellow citizens with the exact same plan!Peace. Solitude. Nature. Sunday crowds, or the quiet of "Monday Morning".Which do you prefer? Hahnemühle German Etching Paper | Giclée Fine Art Print Our Giclée Fine Art Prints are simply the finest prints available. They are expertly printed on Hahnemühle German Etching paper with archival inks.This heavyweight paper (310gsm) is velvety smooth with a fine surface texture. Premium mould-made and with a distinct pattern, German Etching preserves the feeling of genuine art.Four deckle edges complete each print, providing a classic touch.Giclée Fine Art Prints are available in four sizes.--Giclée Fine Art Print | Easel | 18" x 12" | 42cm x 30cm  Giclée Fine Art Print | Studio | 24" x 16" | 60cm x 42cmGiclée Fine Art Print | Gallery |  34" x 24" | 84cm x 60cm   Giclée Fine Art Print | Museum | 48" x 34" | 119cm x 84cm--Note: The sizes above are approximate - they vary slightly with the dimensional integrity of the individual artworks. Crossing the Bridge | Edvard Munch | Giclée Fine Art Print An empty bridge… a walk at sunset... when suddenly the setting sun turns the clouds "a blood red" as if an "infinite scream passing through nature” has occurred.It has been said: “Could only have been painted by a madman”. At some time in our lives, when we scream silently in despair, are we not "Crossing the Bridge"?  The Boat | John Waterhouse | Giclée Fine Art Print Legends tell that a beautiful woman lived alone in a tower on an island by this river. One day she glimpsed in her cursed mirror the reflected image of the fair knight Lancelot and chanced to gaze at him directly. The mirror cracked and a spell fell upon her. She drifted in her boat downstream ‘singing her last song’ and died before she reached Camelot and her love."The Boat" is indeed a beautiful and haunting work of Art. The Sea of Fog | Caspar Friedrich | Giclée Fine Art Print A rocky precipice boldly rises above a landscape covered in a thick sea of fog. Considered one of the founders of Classical Romanticism, Friedrich said : "The artist should paint not only what he has in front of him but also what he sees inside himself.”Experiencing "The Sea of Fog", should we not feel the same? The Long Table | Leonardo da Vinci | Giclée Fine Art Print Leonardo painted this masterpiece on the wall of the dining room in the refectory of the Dominican convent of Santa Maria delle Grazie.Done in tempera and oil on gypsum, instead of the standard fresco technique commonly used in this era, the painting moves us with its magnificence.A superior Giclee Fine Art Print, as close to the original as possible... which begs the question: exactly what happened at "The Long Table"?  


 

 
 An Indiegogo World Premiere ~ Introducing new Art Posters!Featuring a bold and modern look, they offer Disappearance quality at a great price. Dawn | Maxfield Parrish | Art Poster Art Posters are available in four sizes.--Art Poster | Small | 16" x 12" | 40cm x 30cmArt Poster | Medium | 28" x 20" | 70cm x 50cmArt Poster | Large | 36" x 24" | 91cm x 61cmArt Poster | Giant | 40" x 28" | 100cm x 70cm-- This Disappearance Indiegogo campaign of two weeks duration is planned so that you will receive your Giclée Fine Art Prints and Art Posters six to eight weeks after the end of the campaign.The Sea of Fog | Caspar Friedrich | Art Poster These premium quality Art Posters are printed on archival acid-free 190gsm paper. The Hill | Andrew Wyeth | Art Poster  Below are the nine Art Posters available in your choice of four sizes.   The Art Poster print quality is superb, looking great with and without frames.Below is a comparison showing the differences between our Giclée Fine Art Prints and the new Art Posters.   Here is chart depicting the relative sizes of our Giclée Fine Art Prints and Art Posters.  Giclée Fine Art Prints and Art Posters are shipped carefully rolled in sturdy premium tubes. All shipments include worldwide tracking.   Dent-de-Lion du Midi is Master Artist at Teeth of the Lion studios in Bern, Switzerland.A lifelong artist, his extensive portfolio includes works of literature, orchestral music, film, illustration and sculpture. A classicist with a modern eye, his work explores the philosophical dichotomy between realism and myth.As a professional inventor, Dent-de-Lion holds numerous patents and was Director of Digital Research for LEGO, trailblazing projects in VR, digital toys and feature film.For all enquiries, please contact his personal assistant Monika Iris Young: monika@teethofthelion.com  Thank you for your visit.Disappearance is based on classic paintings by John Waterhouse, Maxfield Parrish, Pieter Bruegel, Edward Hopper, Georges Seurat, Edvard Munch, Andrew Wyeth, Caspar Friedrich, and Leonardo da Vinci. New works will include paintings by Vincent van Gogh, Pablo Picasso, Sandro Botticelli, David Hockney and many others. Much love to our friends and family, to our patrons, sponsors and benefactors, and to our colleagues at Indiegogo, Apple, Hasselblad, Procreate, Backerkit, and Skriba who have helped us so much. The music in the project video is a public domain recording of a great favorite.Music | Pictures at an ExhibitionComposer | Modest Mussorgsky, orchestrated by Maurice Ravel Performer | Minneapolis Symphony OrchestraConductor | Antal Dorati The solo piano in the museum video is performed by A. Ghindin.-Thank you dear backers for your support for our work, it's sincerely appreciated!Roar!

story:
Not Me, US!

It's the Bernie Sanders we all know and love meets the style of the greatest manga/anime Akira! What's not to like? Unless you're a politically divisive person! 

Proceeds of the campaign go to https://www.poorpeoplescampaign.org/

What's Being Funded

Stretch Goals!

Should the campaign reach these goals, these items and upgrades will be available!

$1000- 3 Color print moves up to 4 colors!

$1200- 3" Bernie Sticker free with every order!

$1400- 2 Button Packs available! (Free with every order!)

$2000- "Multiple Sticker pack" free with every order!

$2500- Enamel Pin backer upgrade to letterpress backer

$3000- Enamel Pin free with every order!

$4000- TBD

With every stretch goal met, the greater the donation

Risks & Challenges

Assuming no one has been in a coma for the past year or so but Covid is still around and will be a challenge for everything to meet its deadline. Please show everyone some grace! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Donate straight to https://www.poorpeoplescampaign.org/

Or to Bernie himself- https://berniesanders.com/

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

Hey all! Many of you that know me have either received a few free art pieces from me in the past, or know that painting and drawing have been passions of mine for some time. I've never taken the leap to actually sell any of my pieces, as I've struggled with some insecurities in the past about my talents. I figured a self-taught artist could never be good enough to gain any notice, let alone to make a profit off of her own work! That changes today. I've created something I've found so inspiring that I want to share her with the world. In fact, I've felt so inspired lately that I'm finally ready to take the leap and believe in my ability to create and to sell what I make.

What We Need & What You Get

I need your help! I've run out of most of my art supplies - paints, papers, markers, sketch books, etc. and am in serious need of replenishing my stock before I can move ahead with a few of the other pieces I've been itching to create. Your support will go directly towards purchasing supplies for future pieces, or towards pre-ordering a copy of my latest painting, 'Maiden Magna Mater'.

Perks include anything from a personal shout-out to a framed copy of the original painting.

The Impact

There's no real goal here as far as funds raised! I'll keep the campaign going for the next 60 days and post updates about the supplies I've been able to purchase with your support, as well as progress photos of 'Maiden Magna Mater'. All pre-orders will be shipped at the campaign's conclusion, as I will be out of state studying holism for 30 days out of the campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you believe in my work, feel free to share this campaign on your social media! The more traffic, the better chance I'll have to receive enough support to purchase all of the supplies I need to keep me going throughout the rest of 2019.

story:
My name is Gabriel Castillo. I am an Actor, Writer and New York City Taxi Driver. For many years I was ashamed to ever say I was a  Taxi Driver. But I have learned that the things we do to survive and put food on the table and give beautiful things to our loved ones are meant to be appreciated.

So Yes. I am a New York City Taxi Driver. And that is why I have a story to tell because of the cabs. Sometimes in life, things choose us. Because what you ask the Universe will always manifest.

This One man show examines a Cab Driver that is stranded and by some Miracle he has an audience that will just let him spill the beans and redeem his spirit. People that want to hear his side of the story and why the Cabbies felt that they had to end it.

A Comedic/Dramatic Piece. That moves like a Taxi Ride. And will have you appreciating the next Ride you take.

I am launching this campaign because I have completed the writing of the script. And the next step is to start securing resources, so that I can begin with a reading.

* Locate and Commit to a performance venue. Off- Broadway Venue

* Organize and Implement the Promotion and Marketing Materials. Play Bill and Website.

Online marketing on platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter to really reach our audience.

My Contributors would help me Achieve the realization of launching Our show. Which is a show about the movement in transportation, how the Yellow Cabs have and are slowly becoming extinct.

You supporters would help the 135k Drivers have a voice. That was taken away from us. And I could spread the message of Unity to the People. Because if every Driver was united and stopped driving for as long as it takes until our voice was heard. For Christ sakes we are the ones driving the car!

  • We are trying to reach our Goal of 30k Which should cover our expenses for a 3 Week performance of the show. 
  • Venue will be  Ars Nova on 12th Avenue will be $ 800.00 Per Night Equaling to 9600.00 This would give us a 99 seat venue with 2 Technicians. This would include the expenses of Comp Tickets for Producers and also Family Members  and also Sponsoring Personnel. Along with Industry.
  • Director will cost $250.00 a Day for the Direction of the production. $ 3000.00
  • Makeup Artist will cost $150.00 A night for $ 1800.00 for Duration of the show.
  • Rehearsal Rental would be $ 50.00 an Hour or $1050 for 21hrs or Equivalent of 3 Weeks rehearsal space.
  • Speech coach will be 150.00 an Hour for 12hours totaling $1800.00 Due to the duration of the Play. 
  • Stage Manager $150.00 Per Show.
  • Production Management Support. $2000.00 Consultation to oversee the The Creation and Maintenance of the Production of Yo Taxi.
  • Artist Expense Projections. Will be on a Equity Showcase Contract. But will be living on the minimum. The cause is greater than the sandwich.

The Yo Taxi Perks are out of this world!

  • Autographed Taxi Receipt Paper from The Original Garage where Idea was born.
  • Autographed Police Tickets. Official Tickets That have caused me hundreds of dollars will be a perk to go to a cause. 
  • Original Storyboard Art Work by Prolific Artist and Brother Robert Castillo (He has no choice)
  • Rides in the City from Manhattan to Brooklyn, Hell even a JFK or Laguardia from Artist. A Great Taxi Driver is a Humble Taxi Driver.
  • $5.00 Perks get you Original Dispatcher Receipts. 
  • Bigger Donations will feature Producer and Opening Night Tickets and Seating.
  • VIP Packages will include Portraits and Night out with Artist where I will be an As Directed driver for the Night in a NYC Yellow Cab (Minivan or Camry can be requested)
  • The Funds will go into the production if we don't reach our goal. There is a sane.
  • The show must go on.

The Impact we will have is that we will have shared our message with all of New York City. The Cab Drivers are being mistreated. The FHV Drivers are being taken advantage of. At the end of the day we have to all examine ourselves. And that is what this play does.

We are Human beings and we can change things. We cannot allow corporations to make slaves out of Human Beings and be okay with that. This industry has been plagued for so many years, fighting with City Hall for many years with Police Tickets and Speed Limits.

To now being fined for not wearing a seatbelt. Most Cabbies develop Bladder Problems on the job. It is a very acceptable form of cruelty. The City has to respect people's lives just as the respect everyone's Religion and Sex and everything.

They have to respect our lives on the streets. We have served New York for over One Hundred Plus Years in our history of Cab Drivers. And throughout that span. There has never been a Play or recognition for these Drivers. But I feel that in my heart. That the abuse on the road is a form of Bullying and Its about time we confront this growing Problem. And that's why I developed this show.

The day I received Three Tickets last year is where the Idea was planted. I have to tell who ever will listen. These drivers are being Bullied by the System. And I am a Driver. But I am a person first. And my voice will be heard. And New York is the show me State. So I will show everyone what really went on before the Suicides took place. Because I was there. And my loved ones know what damage has been done because of this job. I have lost so many things in life. But I want to bring closure to all the families that are in that place with questions. I want them to heal. And I offer my craft to help them and help myself move on. Because everyone deserves to know the truth. And we have to be an example for the young kids of today. And Bullying in any for has to stop.

  • This is A one of a kind Show that will be just that A Taxi Ride. Except this one is headed somewhere Special. Somewhere where we discover humanity all over again.
  • I am a New Yorker Born in the Bronx. I have been pursuing my career with my up's and downs and I have been successful and I have failed. But when your heart is into a project. It's like your super sensitive and emotional. And It's something I haven't felt in a very long time. It's almost like seeing your child for the very first time I hear. And I know I can't do it alone. It takes a village to raise a child. And everybody receiving this link. It's because it was supposed to reach you. I am gonna send this to anyone and everyone. Because I always tell my Cabbie friends don't worry One day we are gonna get our day. Even if it's My Day. They will also be there. So it will be Our Day. I always joke with them and say this is Guantanomo on wheels.

The Risk that we have is that we will like every other show go through hurdles. We will have our challenges like everyone else. We will change our minds on certain aspects of the show and what direction the show wants to go and what direction we want the show to go in. But in the end we will go with the truth of the show. And that is what I believe everyone tries to achieve. To have the production keep it's raw truth but to polish the kinks of the show and what works to what doesn't. I hope that doesn't sound to complicated. 

  • The Qualities I bring is the persistence of never giving up and an undying quench for perfection and in constant search of the truth. To be transparent and let the audience into that place. It's what every artist strives for. To keep it genuine. But also to surround myself around with a great team. My success is everyone's success. It's a team effort. So I'm not one to just take all the credit. And my completing this script was support from the people God puts in your life. And the finishing of the script is a testament of never giving up. I let it marinate. That's what I've heard other artist say. The truth is I had to pay my bills. And the Cabs just stopped providing even that basic necessity. So I was in between a rock and a hard place. That's my favorite sain. Besides the line in Crimson Tide. A joke that only my brother gets. 
  • My plan to solve every and any problem would be to look at and dissect the problem. To try and seek advice and also talk with people who have expertise in the issue. You can't think you alone is gonna solve all the problems. That's a recipe for disaster. Me and my team will solve the problems with the support of my contributors. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • For those of you that can't donate. Don't worry. Just spread the news and the link. I am grateful you're even looking at this. Just let other people know about this movement. I feel that over the last couple of years we have stumbled upon progress. And this is something in my heart that I have to get out.
  • Just copy and paste my link. To any and everybody. The whole thing is we all know someone who is a Driver and makes their living from Driving Taxi's whether it's Yellow or Green or Black or the App Vehicle's. We are all being used and abused. I represent everybody with this production. So think about them also.

story:
Моя творческая миссия!

Моя цель собрать 50 предзаказов на портреты, чтобы минимизировать расходы на транспортировку материалов. 
По моему подсчетам предзаказы на количество 50 штук, и отправкой их в течении месяца, поможет мне дать вам очень привлекательную цену - 40 $ на портрет; 
Для того, чтобы оставить заявку на портрет пройдите по ссылке ... или напишите мне ...

Как я рисую!

Рисование портрета - самое сложное и трудоемкое направление в изобразительном искусстве. Годы тренировок и более тысячи портретов за спиной все больше вызывают во мне желание профессионально заняться этим жанром. Я не использую супер-эффекты, супер-неповторимую технику исполнения. Я стараюсь и выкладываюсь на все 100%. Я просто рисую и получаю удовольствие от результата. Бывают моменты, когда музы не оказывается рядом и опускаются руки. Тогда я начинаю драться с бумагой, холстом. Карандаш или кисть - вот мое оружие! Я побеждаю всегда!

Обо мне. О художнике.

Для начала давайте познакомимся, меня зовут Максим, мне 27 лет и я всю жизнь рисую! Я родился и живу в России, но искусство не имеет границ, поэтому я решил быть человеком- художником мира! Я хочу рисовать новые счастливые лица из разных стран! За моей молодой спиной годы тренировок и более тысячи портретов! Мои первые воспоминания в жизни связаны с рисованием. Уже в 3 года я осознавал, что рисую лучше своих друзей. Однажды я, нарисовав свою маму, понял, что создание портретов - мой путь. После школы я занялся профессиональным обучением в Пензенском Художественном Училище им. К. А. Савицкого и в Российской Академии Живописи, Ваяния и Зодчества Ильи Глазунова. За годы обучения у меня уже состоялась первая персональная выставка: «Лица города Пензы».

А вот примеры моих учебных работ:

С недавних пор я снова начал заниматься именно портретами. Создал свой сайт , где Вы так же можете посмотреть на мои работы. Люблю писать маслом на холсте и рисовать простыми карандашами на бумаге:

А вот так выглядит моя живопись вблизи:

Вот мои портреты в графике:

Как Вы еще можете мне помочь.

Вы можете поддержать меня рассказав обо мне своим знакомым, друзьям или близким. Так же можете поддержать меня финансово или поделиться обо мне в социальных сетях интернета.
story_txt: Моя творческая миссия!Моя цель собрать 50 предзаказов на портреты, чтобы минимизировать расходы на транспортировку материалов. По моему подсчетам предзаказы на количество 50 штук, и отправкой их в течении месяца, поможет мне дать вам очень привлекательную цену - 40 $ на портрет; Для того, чтобы оставить заявку на портрет пройдите по ссылке ... или напишите мне ...Как я рисую!Рисование портрета - самое сложное и трудоемкое направление в изобразительном искусстве. story:
“Goshavanq” – place that tells Armenian history.

Each stone fix a story of the nation who survived, who had many fights and whose dream is to live in peaceful land.

Have you ever heard about Armenia?

It’s small heaven surrounded with mountains, with beautiful nature and full of story telling stones.

During the ages Armenians have created temples, churches and “cross-stones” as a prove of their existence.

One of those proves is “Goshavanq” – museum within the church. Here you can find any evidence about Armenian history, books and items created before Christ saved and passed to the museum.

 Many years passed from that day, nowadays the museum is in destroyed situation and because of that the history dies.

The aim of our initiative is to renovate the museum, to give to the history fresh and modern breath and make it stay as a place where each person can feel true and visible past. Renovation includes innovative approaches, such as: speaking walls, screen, audio-guide.

Our project have two parts:

  1. Making documentary film about “Goshavanq” and the museum.
  2. To renovate the museum of Goshavanq with speaking walls, audio guide and modern design.

Total amount needed for the idea is 30.000$, and due to kind donation of Friends Film Production, we already have 10.000$ /it’s a part of the money for the documentary film/, left gather only 20.000$:

- 5000$ for documentary movie

- 15.000$ for renovation of the museum.

 

What will you receive with your donation?

  1. DVD of documentary movie.
  2. Free access and audio tour to Goshavanq museum.

 

We hope you will help us to keep the history alive by having even your small contribution by donating money or sharing the campaign!

story:
UPDATE:

Due to the resurgence of COVID-19 infections in our manufacturing city, our initial manufacturers have closed down and we are unable to fulfill perks at the price we offered. We thus made the decision to refund all orders. Thank you for the support. 

We have partnered with new manufactures and will be selling our product direct to consumer via our online store (https://kansocase.com/).

Our Story

With the current situation, the world is upheaved into disarray, clutter and chaos. 

Kanso (かんそ) is a Japanese zen principle meaning "simplicity or elimination of clutter". It is one of the seven principles of the zen philosophy which allows wabi-sabi, a state of awareness of the imperfection and impermanence of things, to be attained.

We embody this principle to our exclusive phone case designs, allowing you to have a constant visual reminder to remove clutter and liabilities in your life. Each design is only manufactured 100 times and once a design is sold out, it will never return. 

In the near future, we plan to collaborate with brands and artists to bring exclusive designs to you. Join us today by backing Kanso's mission to be the most exclusive limited edition phone case brand in the region!


What You Get

  1. Limited Edition Kanso Case (1/100)
  2. 1 Year International Warranty
  3. Complimentary Worldwide Shipping 
  4. 3x 10% Total Cart Coupon Code (NEW)

 

Kanso Case Specifications

Kanso Case protects your phone from scratches, dust, oil, and dirt. It has a solid back and flexible sides that make it easy to take on and off, with precisely aligned cuts and holes.

  1. BPA free Hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
  2. Solid polycarbonate back
  3. Flexible polyurethane sides
  4. 0.5 mm raised bezel
  5. See-through sides
  6. Wireless charging compatible

We embody the Kanso principle to our supply chain as well. Each design is only manufactured 100 times. This allows us to keep our supply chain simple and agile. Once a design is sold out, it will never return. 

 



 

APPLE:
iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone 6 Plus/ 6s Plus, iPhone 6/ 6s, iPhone 7 Plus/ 8 Plus, iPhone 7/ 8, iPhone X/XS, iPhone XR

SAMSUNG: 
Samsung Galaxy S20, Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra, Samsung Galaxy S10, Samsung Galaxy S10+, Samsung Galaxy S10e, Samsung Galaxy S9, Samsung Galaxy S9+, Samsung Galaxy S8, Samsung Galaxy S8+

 


Team & Stretch Goals

Our team has extensive backgrounds in product and web development. Our advisory panel consists of CAD engineers, graphic designers and e-commerce brand owners who we consult whenever we face roadblocks. 

We are confident in reliably producing high-quality products and setting up a robust supply chain infrastructure. In addition, to make Kanso a truly exclusive brand, we have a roadmap to develop technical solutions like an authenticity checker and an official resale marketplace.

 

Partnerships & Marketing 


 

Risks & Challenges

We are transparent by providing insights into the risks and obstacles we might face on the way

  • Further worsening of the COVID-19 situation might affect fulfilment timing. As of today, our fulfilment centres are confident of delivering our Kanso Cases to you.
  • We are co-funding our supply chain set up with our backers. In the event we are not able to deliver our products due to the lack of funding, we will refund all backers. 


Other Ways You Can Help

You can contact us via email at kansocase@gmail.com. Sharing our campaign with your circle of influence would be the best we could ever ask for. Thank you! ありがとうございました.

story:
The project is about weaving traditional Berber carpets.

An overview on the traditional Berber carpets:

The history of traditional Berber carpets goes back thousands of years. Those carpets are weaved using wool and woolen threads, based on demand and type. Its strings are stretched with great precision to draw the traditional symbols and geometric shapes that distinguish each carpet from another.

Traditional Berber carpets carry patterns, symbols and colors that have deep social connotations and expressive human dimensions, which reflect the old conservative Berber heritage, such as the nature of the marital relationship and the family unification.

The traditional Berber carpets are considered to be thin carpets woven with wool, and are able to compete with the best types of carpets in the world.

Project stages:

A - Purchase the weaving equipment such as carpet weaver, combs, and equipment of yarn and dyeing.

B - Buying raw materials such as wool and other materials, considering that the raw materials go through many stages to be ready for weaving, such as combing and dyeing the wool, yarning it and turning it into threads to facilitate the weaving process.

D - Preparation of the equipment and raw materials and starting the weaving process, considering that weaving a single carpet takes couple of days based on the size of the carpets and the symbols it carries.

C - Delivery of the carpet on the specified date.

Notes: 

1 - With regards to colors, symbols, geometric shapes, or the so-called patterns of the carpets, there are mainly 4 colors; meanwhile, the symbols and geometric shapes are adequately available, and we will do our best to provide more colors and patterns.

2 - As for the delivery, the price will be according to the weight and size of the carpet, and the packing will be insured and of high quality.

Risks

There are no risks except the date of delivery, which may incur slight delays, however we will do our best to provide the delivery on time.

story:
Story

We came up with the idea to run this campaign after the Bernie Sanders meme took over the internet. If this becomes a successful story, it will open up more doors to other innovative ideas we have in store. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Bobbleheads are an important piece of collection reflecting artists, musicians, and other figures. We proudly introduce the Bernie Sanders edition.

Own the bobblehead that had every user up and above. The MEME that went viral and took more publicity than the inauguration itself can now be YOURS.

We started making our first attempts at getting a prototype.  After several prototypes our results were interesting, after receiving this amazing piece, we started on prototype #4, and although the prototype didn't get the head right on the first try.

 

It was easily fixed. And led to our, favorite Bobblehead design!

 

Pledge Tiers

As we believe simpler is better. So we've broken down all our perks into three components:

The Earlybird Perk, The One & Only Perk, and The Double Trouble Perk in which we've expanded the options to accommodate those who would like benefit for a discount or to get more than one bobblehead.   

We are currently aiming at 3,500 Euros which will be used for production and transportation costs. 

If we don't reach our goal, we will cancel the campaign and you will be automatically refunded by Indiegogo. 

Our shipping company will receive and confirm that the products are intact. In case you received the product with any damages, the shipping company is responsible for the refunds.

The Impact

We thought that this would be a valuable project as it will surely pave the way for other innovative ideas that we have in mind, and with the support of funders and investors, we're on the right track.

Finding the right product with the specifications we are looking for was hard to find. Our deep research got us to find the perfect combination of quality, delivery, and cost.

Risks & Challenges

One of the obstacles we were facing was to create the best design & delivering these products to the doorsteps of every buyer around the world. 

We teamed up with designers, manufacturers, and shipping companies that have a proven track records - and with good planning of how the purchase journey will operate, we made sure that the process won't have any loopholes.

Other Ways You Can Help

 Help us spread the word by sharing and supporting our project so we can introduce more interesting and innovative gadgets by using the Indiegogo share tools!

Do remember that support doesn't have to be financial. Here are some ways you can help us achieve our goals:

  •  Help us spread the word about the Bernie Sanders bobblehead by sharing on your Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and other social media platforms. Every post, retweet, share, and mention gets us closer to our goal.
  •  Please follow our campaign for more updates.

story:
We aren't your nan's skateboarding company. Abbadon Skateboards wants to bring back intense, engaging, and metal graphics to the action sports market. We need your help to get our company off the ground.

Your donations will go towards:

Printing our unique Skateboard deck designs

Printing our Sticker packs

Printing our Original Screen Prints

Printing our T-shirts

And funding business expenses. We love the skating community and we want our voice to be heard.

Thank you,

Joe Regan, Art Director/Illustrator

We need your help to get our company off the ground.Your donations will go towards:Printing our unique Skateboard deck designsPrinting our Sticker packsPrinting our Original Screen PrintsPrinting our T-shirtsAnd funding business expenses.
