story:
What is Wilde Garden Art?

Wilde Garden Art is a passion and platform of my life to connect and share a message with the world. The Garden began early in life and in recent years has developed a name as I have discovered the purpose.

My mission is to seed curiosity while connecting humans spiritually on global scale. With all creations, I hope to captivate the passerby or viewer...to stop them in their tracks...to make them stand still and forget everything running through their minds.  I create each sighting with intent to bring the viewer back to a place of clarity, stillness, and silence.  Pure love, unity, and respect emanates from the core of each structure, set visually in a manner to communicate with all. 

Check out my most recent updates here! https://www.instagram.com/wildegardenart/

What does your contribution mean to me?

Your addition will assist me in continuing to Wilde Garden as a successful business and provide a variety of merchandise. Funding would allow me to open doors to more opportunities as well as:

  • Invest in an inventory of functional art work (Tote bags, clothing, coffee mugs, wall art, ect..) through and beyond this following year.
  • Grow a business while avoiding debt.
  • Travel and immerse in cultures and nature other than what I have grown up in, opening my perspective of the world in the following two years and beyond. Costa Rica and Bali are first on my list! Why Costa Rica and Bali? All of my inspiration of life and art is derived from nature. Visiting Costa Rica and Bali would allow me to submerse myself in just that. New foliage, new smells, plants, creatures and more await me on the journey.
  • Provide a vehicle to travel the US for a grassroots & personal approach to sharing my message. I have only dipped my toes in the possibilities of outreach in the midwest and my looking forward to moving outward and reaching a larger audience!
  • Attend my first class with Visionary Artist, Amanda Sage at the Vienna Academy of Visionary Art to learn techniques passed down by the masters of Visionary Art. I am anxiously awaiting the announcement of Amandas next class at the VAVA!

​What does donating mean for you?

A warm & fuzzy feeling that you’ve supported a life of passion of course ;) ..oh and there are perks!

I have several perks for donations big and small - any contribution is appreciated and helpful! Some items I may provide to you are a canvas print, vinyl stickers, a tote bag, or coffee mug. Please review the perks to see a full list of items from the Wilde Garden coming to you!

If you are unable to donate at this time, I thank you for coming this far with me. You can still contribute by sharing this campaign through Indiegogo and all avenues of the inter-webs! I would love to hear from you - please stay in touch with me however you choose : ) If you are interested in purchasing art, keep an eye on my ever evolving stores, listed below! And of course you can always see what I am up to and get in touch with me by following my Instagram (my favorite) and/or Facebook. 

Email:  wildegardenart@gmail.com
Instagram:  wildegardenart
Facebook:  facebook.com/wildegardenart
Society6:  society6.com/wildegarden
Etsy:  etsy.com/shop/wildegardenart

Thank you
story_txt:
What is Wilde Garden Art?
Wilde Garden Art is a passion and platform of my life to connect and share a message with the world. The Garden began early in life and in recent years has developed a name as I have discovered the purpose.My mission is to seed curiosity while connecting humans spiritually on global scale. With all creations, I hope to captivate the passerby or viewer...to stop them in their tracks...to make them stand still and forget everything running through their minds.  I create each sighting with intent to bring the viewer back to a place of clarity, stillness, and silence.  Pure love, unity, and respect emanates from the core of each structure, set visually in a manner to communicate with all. Check out my most recent updates here! https://www.instagram.com/wildegardenart/What does your contribution mean to me?Your addition will assist me in continuing to Wilde Garden as a successful business and provide a variety of merchandise. Funding would allow me to open doors to more opportunities as well as:

Invest in an inventory of functional art work (Tote bags, clothing, coffee mugs, wall art, ect..) through and beyond this following year.

Grow a business while avoiding debt.

Travel and immerse in cultures and nature other than what I have grown up in, opening my perspective of the world in the following two years and beyond. Costa Rica and Bali are first on my list! Why Costa Rica and Bali? All of my inspiration of life and art is derived from nature. Visiting Costa Rica and Bali would allow me to submerse myself in just that. New foliage, new smells, plants, creatures and more await me on the journey.

Provide a vehicle to travel the US for a grassroots & personal approach to sharing my message. I have only dipped my toes in the possibilities of outreach in the midwest and my looking forward to moving outward and reaching a larger audience!

Attend my first class with Visionary Artist, Amanda Sage at the Vienna Academy of Visionary Art to learn techniques passed down by the masters of Visionary Art. I am anxiously awaiting the announcement of Amandas next class at the VAVA!
​What does donating mean for you?A warm & fuzzy feeling that you’ve supported a life of passion of course ;) ..oh and there are perks!I have several perks for donations big and small - any contribution is appreciated and helpful! Some items I may provide to you are a canvas print, vinyl stickers, a tote bag, or coffee mug. Please review the perks to see a full list of items from the Wilde Garden coming to you!If you are unable to donate at this time, I thank you for coming this far with me. You can still contribute by sharing this campaign through Indiegogo and all avenues of the inter-webs! I would love to hear from you - please stay in touch with me however you choose : ) If you are interested in purchasing art, keep an eye on my ever evolving stores, listed below! And of course you can always see what I am up to and get in touch with me by following my Instagram (my favorite) and/or Facebook. Email:  wildegardenart@gmail.comInstagram:  wildegardenartFacebook:  facebook.com/wildegardenartSociety6:  society6.com/wildegardenEtsy:  etsy.com/shop/wildegardenartThank you

story:
Chizzle is a smart sculpting surface for anyone looking to get their hands dirty sculpting, but either don't know how to get started, or don't know how to make something truly cool. Chizzle teaches beginners the foundational skills needed to get started, and guides more advanced artists through the subtle techniques of sculpting masterpieces.

Download templates and models or share your creations as 3D files. Recreate other people’s work and send them yours to be remixed. 

It’s been a while since we were all able to see and admire the works and masterpieces of history’s finest artists, but we haven’t really leveraged technology to recreate many of those skills.
Chizzle is revolutionizing the way art is taught and created, enabling anyone to become a part-time apprentice to history’s sculpting maestros. But that’s only the beginning.

The science behind "fake it till you make it" is solid and long-ago proven. We're taking it one step further: make it till you make it.  Experiments have shown that ACTUALLY DOING SOMETHING is the best way to learn HOW TO DO IT. In other words, trying to surf once will teach you more about surfing than reading a dozen books about it.  The Chizzle Surface and the Studio have been designed to do just that- walk you through sculpting. It'll show you EXACTLY what to do to create specific sculptures, and in REAL-TIME.
 

 

 

The Standard Modelling Tool Set

Every Chizzle perk comes with our set of 3 double-ended sculpting tools, amounting to 6 super-useful modelling tips. We like them because they're durable, just the right amount of flexibility, fun to grip and stronger than wood.  

 

 

 

The Advanced Modelling Tool Set

The advanced set is an additional 3 tools consisting of 6 ceramic modelling tips. We use them for all sorts of ceramic maneuvers. Includes the 3 found in the Basic set above, plus 3 more tools shaped for more advanced sculpting. All 6 double-ended tools are made from flexible high quality polypropylene.

 

 

Alexey is CEO of Chizzle and is responsible for everything related to business growth and strategy and oversees the production work by the design and engineering teams. While this is far from an easy task, his vast experience in industrial design and mechanical engineering and manufacturing is how he makes his 16 hour days look like a walk in the park. 

 

Donara is in charge of logistics and financial development. She is an experienced strategic planner, and excels at organic business growth. Donara’s vast  knowledge as an industrial designer has given her a lot of insight into managing a product 's development from the very beginning to a fully realized product. Donara also manages relations with international suppliers and factories.  Like Alexey, she too is a graduate of Industrial Design (B. Design).

 


Alex Lurye is a high tech professional with over 16 years of experience
in software development and is an expert in software architecture. In the last 8 years he served as CTO in a software warehouse company, leading development projects and building software architecture. Alex holds a B.Sc. in Math and Computer Sciences.

story:
There is a myth, that says: it is almost impossible to buy the right gift, for the person you want;

we live in a consumers society, which means if you need something, you buy it. It is affordable so when you break it, you buy a new one.

How to get someone something right, to prevent our apartments from being full of stuff you feel sorry to throw away?

Money? Definitely not! Giving money away it's not appropriate for many reasons, you can imagine.

It may look I want to turn all of this gifting into a bad thing. Nothing farther away from that!

What I want to do, is expose the real only thing that matters when you gift a gift.

As mentioned physical items are not what the receiver wants. But showing to a person you care for them in a bigger way they thought, recognizing what they've done for you, knowing they've got the most memorable gift in their life from you... is what counts for all.

With this idea was the box created.

 

The truth

You have probably noticed the thing I'm concerned too, about this campaign.

In short words: it looks unprofessional, like a freaking joke or (scam maybe) done by an 11 years old kid who had nothing to do that afternoon.

It is hard to work without some real gear and resources.

The last thing I would do in this world is complaining over stuff,

but I want you to know, that I'm aware of the real situation and hopefully understand that I have 

enthusiastically focused on the ..

..final product

There are no concrete or exact dimensions about the final product because I wanted to gain some more flexibility on that, but in the end, will almost surely be similar or identical to the prototype on the video. 

I can proudly announce that the production is almost ready to flow!

After some negotiation, and a lot of things explained to me, by the potential executors of the mass production order, I can quite surely say: "Yep it's all on you now, they're waiting for my minimum order, and I'm waiting for you, to allow me bringing joy and innovation into many people's lives, (including me).

 

You


I indescribable hope you are able to afford one of this boxes and wish you will, so at the next occasion you won't remember of this project thinking "it wasn't worth it anyway" 

though you will have the box in your hands and you will say " hell yea - it was worth it" because you will try it out and live it.

Let me be a pervert, and try to encourage you spending money for this craft with the following sentences:

Money is relative - today it's here, tomorrow is gone (for a nonsense).

What you have lived, experienced, no one can take it away from you.

Imagine a rich guy, with a lot of money on his bank account, he can't even touch, he is so selfish, he won't even get out of his house for stopping himself from buying anything.

And a nice guy who bought all of the boxes and has an entire life ahead for gifting them, because that is not a problem to him, considering all the friends he has.

:D

What does money help you if you cannot use it?

And this is one of the best things to use money on...

Okay, let's quit it here    I don't want to be accused of some kind of robbery or stuff...

 

 Like my grandpa used to say: "the time you've passed in good, you haven't passed in bad"

(not in English of course)

 

Risks and challenges 

There are always risks, literally in everything you do.

The most important ones are listed here ( definitely should read before backing ):

  • The prototype may variate in size and look, from the final product,
  • If one of the details I have calculated(canvases distribution) goes wrong, the delivery date will move from 09/17 to 10/17 at least. "have pointed out this, because it's very likely to happen".
  • The highest reward "the ?" may take a longer time to be concluded,
  • Even though I have planned everything well, we can still go true some displeasure during our trip. That's why I warmly invite all the backers to follow the updates.

However, I will keep the promise from the video, and with Your help, we will make this dream a reality,

right?!

 

Free help

If I don't have facebook and twitter, it does not mean you don't need to share the campaign with your friends, everywhere you can.

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

Thank you

No stretch goals, early bids, commercials. Only grateful pureness.

 

After some time you will realize, there are not limits to keep this box enslaved only in the gifting section...
